name: Hotel Oktogon Haggenmacher
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Budapest, Hotel Oktogon Haggenmacher features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, some rooms at Hotel Oktogon Haggenmacher also feature a city view. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Hotel Oktogon Haggenmacher offers a vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast. The hotel has a wellness area with a sauna. Popular points of interest near Hotel Oktogon Haggenmacher include House of Terror, Hungarian State Opera and St. Stephen's Basilica. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Parlament
description: This stylish boutique hotel with distinctive elegance is ideally located in the heart of Budapest, only a few steps from the Danube bank, the Parliament and the St. Stephen’s Basilica. All modernly and individually designed rooms of the Ikonik Parlament provide flat-screen TVs, air conditioning and spacious bathrooms. Wired and wireless internet access in the rooms is free of charge. Guests can relax in the spa area, which features a sauna. The Lounge Bar offers a wide variety of cocktails and drinks, the breakfast buffet is served in the hotel's bright, glass-roofed breakfast room. A Happy Hour service is available from 10:00 to 17:00 and features free tea, coffee and mineral water for all guests. The main shopping areas such as the Vaci Ut Street as well as excellent restaurants offering international and Hungarian culinary specialities, trendy cafés and bars are close to the Ikonik Parlament Budapest. Several tram and metro stations are nearby.

name: La Prima Fashion Hotel
description: La Prima Fashion Hotel Budapest enjoys a central location in the heart of Budapest, set on the pedestrian shopping street Váci Utca. It offers stylish rooms with air-conditioning and free access to Wi-Fi. All rooms are soundproofed and feature a flat-screen cable TV and a tea/ coffee maker. The luxuriously decorated rooms have modern bathrooms and a hairdryer. La Prima Fashion Hotel Budapest’s elegant bar and restaurant serve drinks and Hungarian as well as international cuisine. Other facilities on site provide a fitness centre and 24-hour reception services. The Danube promenade is within 200 metres, while Chain Bridge is at the distance of 900 metres. Rudas Bath is also set 900 metres from the property. The nearest metro station at Ferenciek Tere, on line M3, can be reached in 300 metres.

name: D50 Hotel
description: Conveniently set in Budapest, D50 Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Private parking is available on site. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a private bathroom and bed linen. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near D50 Hotel include Heroes' Square, Puskas Ferenc Stadion and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mamaison Hotel Andrassy Budapest
description: The Mamaison Hotel Andrassy Budapest enjoys an excellent location on the luxurious Andrássy Avenue, and offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi. Heroes Square and the famous Széchenyi Thermal Bath are only a 5-minute walk away. The Danube, Váci utca shopping street, the Great Synagogue, the Opera House are all located nearby. A rich buffet breakfast is served in the Andrássy Garden Restaurant. As a guest of the Mamaison Andrassy Hotel you have free access to the Izabella Fitness Center.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Budapest Danube
description: The Four Points by Sheraton Budapest Danube offers excellent services in a peaceful environment, yet within easy reach of the vibrant city centre, in the heart of the 13th district. Thanks to the unique orientation, nearly three quarters of the 105 rooms offer a beautiful view of the Danube, the popular downtown oasis of Margaret Island and the Buda Hills, while two junior suites have been constructed on the upper floors. The hotel's digital solutions further enhance guest comfort, while modern technology creates a strong cohesion with the design featuring original period posters and furnishings that evoke the atmosphere of the 60s and 70s in both the rooms and the public areas. The hotel's facilities and room amenities are perfect for business travellers looking for accommodation in the neighbourhood, while the 50-seat meeting room can fully cater medium-sized events. An equipped gym is available for guests looking to work out. Our rooftop bar up to 40 people welcomes guests with an unforgettable view.Marriott

name: Carat Boutique Hotel
description: The Carat Boutique Hotel is located in the very centre of Budapest, 100 metres from the Deak Ferenc Square metro hub. It features a wellness area and offers free Wi-Fi. All of the elegantly furnished rooms in the Carat hotel are air-conditioned and have a satellite TV. The Great Synagogue, St. Stephen’s Basilica, Andrássy Avenue and the Opera House are just a few steps away.

name: Vagabond Grand'Or
description: No description found

name: Novotel Budapest City
description: Enjoy the 4-star comfort on the Buda side of the Danube at Novotel Budapest City, our modern 9-storey hotel! Breakfast with local specialities in our sunlit restaurant or on the terrace next to Chestnut Park gets your day off to a bright start. The InBalance Fitness and Wellness Area has a gym, saunas, a pool and a sun terrace to chill out. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. Our well-equipped 19 meeting rooms are at your disposal for your events and conferences  with up to 2000 participants.accorhotels.com

name: Prestige Hotel Budapest
description: Set in a renovated historic building in the city centre, the 4-star Prestige Hotel Budapest is 200 metres from the Danube River and 300 metres from the Chain Bridge. Free WiFi is available. All rooms offer elegant Cavalli furniture, air conditioning, a minibar, a flat-screen cable TV, a laptop safe, and a stylish bathroom. Some have views of the street and some have views of the courtyard. International gourmet cuisine can be enjoyed at the Costes Downtown Restaurant. An extended continental breakfast is served also in this restaurant. St. Stephen’s Basilica is 600 metres away from the Prestige Hotel, and Buda Castle is 850 metres away. Tram line 2 stops 190 metres away at Széchenyi rakpart, and metro line M3 stops at Arany János utca, 700 metres away.

name: The Three Corners Downtown Edition Hotel
description: Well set in Budapest, The Three Corners Downtown Edition Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a garden. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 300 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica, 700 metres from Hungarian State Opera and 1.1 km from Dohany Street Synagogue. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms include a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. All units will provide guests with a minibar. Guests at The Three Corners Downtown Edition Hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. Speaking German, English and Hungarian, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. House of Terror is 1.5 km from The Three Corners Downtown Edition Hotel, while Hungarian Parliament Building is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Radisson Hotel Budapest Budapart
description: Radisson Hotel Budapest BudaPart features a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Budapest. The property is around 3.8 km from Hungarian National Museum, 4.6 km from Chain Bridge and 4.7 km from Budapest History Museum. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Radisson Hotel Budapest BudaPart offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Gellért Hill is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from Radisson Hotel Budapest BudaPart.

name: Hotel Millennium
description: Set on the main road connecting Budapest city centre to the airport, the 3-star Hotel Millennium can be reached by car or from the Metro station situated just 300 metres away. Free WiFi is available in the lobby as well as in the rooms. The Restaurant Cannella provides buffet breakfast with fresh pastries and savoury foods. You can be in the city centre in around 10-minute by car. The Shopmark shopping centre is on the same street as the hotel, set 2 metro stops away.

name: Onyx Luxury Budapest
description: No description found

name: Walk Inn Váci 78
description: Ideally situated in the 05. Belváros - Lipótváros district of Budapest, Walk Inn Váci 78 is situated 1.2 km from Gellért Hill, 1.1 km from Dohany Street Synagogue and 1.8 km from Blaha Lujza Square. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Hungarian National Museum, and within 1.4 km of the city centre. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Walk Inn Váci 78 the rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Budapest History Museum, Hungarian State Opera and St. Stephen's Basilica. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 13 km from Walk Inn Váci 78, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Eurostars Danube Budapest
description: Built in 2016, Eurostars Danube Budapest is located in the centre of Budapest, 250 metres from Deák Ferenc Tér transport hub and 400 metres from Dohány Street Synagogue. Free WiFi access is available. Decorated to reflect the ambience of the 1920s, each room here will provide you with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a desk and an electric kettle. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a minibar for a surcharge. At Eurostars Danube Budapest you will find a bar that serves guests in the late afternoon and in the evening, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and free luggage storage. Guests also have access to a fitness centre. There are numerous bars and restaurants in a radius of 300 metres. The bustling Gozsdu Courtyard passage is within 250 metres. The hotel is 500 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica and 600 metres from State Opera House. The historical Andrássy Avenue is within 400 metres, while the pedestrian shopping area Váci Utca can be reached in 600 metres. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 20 km away.

name: Intercontinental Budapest, An IHG Hotel
description: Located on the Danube Promenade with stunning views onto the Danube River and the castle district –one of Budapest’s UNESCO world heritage sites – InterContinental Budapest provides the perfect setting to explore the city’ history, the vibrant gastro scene and all the capital has to offer. Our terrace is the place to be seen in summer and our newly opened ARZ Lebanese Restaurant is a great choice to enjoy culinary delights. Additionally, we offer the largest, natural lit ballroom in the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mera Hotel
description: Set in Budapest, 400 metres from Hungarian State Opera, Mera Hotel features views of the city. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 500 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica, and within 700 metres of the city centre. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Mera Hotel every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking German, English and Hungarian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near Mera Hotel include Dohany Street Synagogue, House of Terror and Blaha Lujza Square. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Central Basilica
description: Opening in January 2017 after a complete renovation, Hotel Central Basilica is situated in the heart of Budapest in a pedestrian steet, only 50 metres from St Stephen's Basilica. It offers elegant, fully equipped rooms with minibar and air conditioning. High-speed and regular types of WiFi are both available. Set within a Classicist-style building dating back to the 19th century, Hotel Central Basilica is easily accessible by car and by public transport. The hotel offers a wide variety of buffet breakfast every morning. Various popular restaurants are situated nearby.

name: Emerald Downtown Luxury Suites with Hotel services
description: Emerald Downtown Suites features a fitness room and a sauna, as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in the centre of Budapest, 600 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue. The aparthotel offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and shower. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a fridge, an oven, and a dishwasher. Emerald Downtown Suites offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Hungarian State Opera, St. Stephen's Basilica and Hungarian National Museum. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Emerald Downtown Suites.

name: Florin Apart Hotel
description: No description found

name: K46 Residence
description: Set less than 1 km from the centre of Budapest, a 5-minute walk from Hungarian State Opera, K46 Residence offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, a garden and a terrace. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each unit has an equipped kitchen, a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV and private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. A fridge, an oven and dishwasher are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include House of Terror, Dohany Street Synagogue and St. Stephen's Basilica. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from K46 Residence, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Marmara Hotel Budapest
description: The Orient-themed Marmara Hotel Budapest is located in the heart of Budapest, next to the Grand Boulevard and 350 metres from the Nyugati Railway Station and M3 Metro Stop. It offers free WiFi. The rooms of the Marmara Hotel Budapest represent a unique blend of modern comfort and relaxed elegance. The standard rooms are facing either the inner courtyard or the street, while all superior rooms are facing the inner courtyard and have a balcony. The lobby bar is an inviting place for a nice chat over your favorite drink. Many famous sights like the Parliament, Margaret Island, St. Stephens Basilica and numerous museums, theatres and shops are just a short walk away.

name: W Budapest
description: Beyond the urban fairytale, awaits an unmatched experience of the city dubbed the Queen of the Danube River. Bold design covers this UNESCO heritage site through 151 stylish guest rooms, including 45 suites. Blending history with modern luxury, you'll stay between ballet and beats, elegance and edge, established and avant-garde. Elevate your nights in underground bars and unlock secret doors to your most intriguing imagination. Why truth or dare when you can have both?Marriott

name: Pest-Buda Hotel
description: Pest-Buda-Hotel Design & Boutique is situated in historic building of the Castle district of Budapest, 200 metres from Matthias Church. Originally opened in 1696, the hotel was renovated in 2016. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant featuring homemade-style cuisine and a seasonal terrace overlooking the Matthias Church. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Available via stairs only, every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer provided. There is a 24-hour availability for check-in at the property. Chain Bridge is 1 km from Pest-Buda Hotel, while Buda Castle is 1 km away. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport can be reached within 19 km from Pest-Buda Hotel.

name: Áurea Ana Palace by Eurostars Hotel Company
description: Featuring a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Áurea Ana Palace by Eurostars Hotel Company is located in the centre of Budapest, less than 1 km from St. Stephen's Basilica. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. Áurea Ana Palace by Eurostars Hotel Company offers a spa centre. The accommodation features amenities such as an on-site business centre, sauna and hammam. Popular points of interest near Áurea Ana Palace by Eurostars Hotel Company include Hungarian State Opera, Hungarian Parliament Building and Dohany Street Synagogue. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Styles Budapest Airport
description: Ibis Styles Budapest Airport is the only hotel directly at Liszt Ferenc Budapest International Airport. 145 stylish and contemporary rooms are ready to welcome you for both business and leisure trips. High-end banqueting facilities are on site to ensure t he success of your meetings. The hotel's cosy bar and international restaurant are ready to welcome you 7 days a week. Excellent parking possibilities for individual or bus arrivals.accorhotels.com

name: Verno House
description: Set in Budapest and with St. Stephen's Basilica reachable within 400 metres, Verno House offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, fitness centre and sauna, as well as a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Verno House provides certain units with city views, and each room includes a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available every morning at Verno House. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Verno House include Hungarian State Opera, Dohany Street Synagogue and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tg Hotel Suites Budapest
description: Located in Budapest, 200 metres from the centre and 200 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica, TG Hotel Suites Budapest provides accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Hungarian State Opera, Dohany Street Synagogue and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from TG Hotel Suites Budapest.

name: ibis Styles Budapest Citywest
description: ibis Styles Budapest Citywest is located at the western gate of Budapest. The hotel offers very easy access from the motorway M1 and M7. The Kelenfold railway and subway station is located nearby. Our hotel is an ideal place both for business and leisure tourists. You will be welcomed by the modern interiors with elements of pop-art style, designed by a famous, contemporary artist Peter Weiler. Inspire yourself with the uniqueness of the city and look for all the surprises that await you.accorhotels.com

name: Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel
description: Surrounded by greenery in the Buda part of Budapest, Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel is 2.5 km from the Citadel and the castle district. It features a wellness centre and free Wi-Fi in rooms. Access to the 2400 m2 wellness area is free of charge for guests. The area includes a swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, salt-, aroma-, and steam cabin. Canapé beds and deck chairs can be used in the relaxation area. Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel houses a restaurant and a cosy bar serving snacks such as sandwiches, pastries, tea and coffee. A hot buffet breakfast is served each morning. The property is well-connected to the city centre. The next bus stop is just 100 metres away and the M1 and M7 motorways are easily accessible.

name: Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest
description: Located centrally in Budapest, Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest is minutes on foot from Deak Ferenc Ter Station and provides a swimming pool and a Finnish sauna. It offers 5-star accommodation and views of the city. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa, Kempinski The Spa. Facilities include free wireless internet and body treatments. Those staying at the property can also enjoy city views from the in-house gym. After a day of sightseeing in the local region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a desk and an in-room safe. Guests of Corvinus Kempinski Budapest are welcome to experience Japanese cuisine at Nobu, or try local dishes at ÉS Bisztró-Brasserie. Afternoon tea is served daily at The Living Room. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Blue Fox The Bar. Hotel Corvinus Kempinski is located in the heart of Budapest’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Buda Castle is easily reached by car.Revato

name: Alta Moda Fashion Hotel
description: Alta Moda Fashion Hotel is centrally located in Budapest, 200 metres from the Great Market Hall and the Fővám tér M4 Metro Stop. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and free WiFi connection throughout the hotel. Each air-conditioned room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is also features. On request, in-room baby amenities, such as a baby cot or a changing table can arranged. The hotel provides 24-hour reception services where staff are ready to help guests with tour and ticket information. The Gellért Thermal Baths on the Buda side is a 5-minute walk from the Alta Moda Fashion Hotel. Budapest's Liszt Ferenc International Airport is situated 17 km away.

name: Hotel Zenit Budapest Palace
description: Situated in the historical city centre of Pest, Hotel Zenit Budapest Palace is 50 metres from the river bank of the Danube. It features a restaurant serving international cuisine and a wellness area with a fitness room and a sauna. Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel free of charge. At an additional cost and upon availability, guests can also borrow a portable WiFi connection, which can be used around the town. All rooms come with air-conditioning and modern furnishings. They feature satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. Each unit also contains a private bathroom with a shower or a bathtub. Zenit Budapest Palace Hotel offers optional show-cooking buffet breakfast, where you can enjoy freshly prepared omelettes. Ironing and laundry services are also provided. Public parking is available for an extra charge. Major city attractions are located in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. Many cafés and restaurants can be visited in the Váci utca, the elegant pedestrian shopping street of the city. Deak Square, the conjunction of 3 metro lines (M1, M2, M3), can be reached within 500 metres. The St. Stephen's Basilica is 1 km from the property, while the Opera House on Andrássy Avenue is 1.5 km away.

name: Hotel Rum Budapest
description: Hotel Rum Budapest is a boutique hotel centrally located in a historical building, a 5-minute walk from the Great Market Hall. The Kálvin tér M3 Metro Stop can be reached within 300 metres. WiFi is free in the entire building. Every individually furnished room is equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units also feature a seating area or a coffee machine for your convenience. The private bathrooms are fitted with shower. Toiletries and a hairdryer are provided. Guests can enjoy the a'la carte breakfast on the hotel's rooftop terrace. A welcome drink awaits you at the reception upon arrival. SOLID Sky&Bar welcomes guests with weekend brunch and a special bar food menu at the evenings from Wednesday to Saturday with views to the Buda Hills. Guests receive 10% discount. The hotel's Michelin Star fine dining restaurant Salt awaits for guests offering Hungarian cuisine. Do not forget to reserve table in advance! The Gellért Thermal Baths is 1 km from Hotel Rum Budapest, while the Dohány street Synagogue is 600 metres away. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 17 km from the property.

name: Gold Hotel Budapest
description: The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with free WiFi, an LCD TV, a minibar, a safe, a work desk and a private bathroom. Apartments are offered for families in the annex building, these are budget type apartments. Buffet breakfast is available in the main building.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Budapest
description: Located in the heart of the cultural and shopping district, The Ritz-Carlton, Budapest is minutes away from historic sites and the Danube River. The luxury hotel is housed within a protected building, offering spacious, contemporary interiors, 171 elegant rooms and 29 suites and the Club Lounge as an additional sanctuary. Club Lounge provides guests with an elevated experience with dedicated concierge and food presentations throughout the day. Situated on the same floor, The Ritz-Carlton Spa awaits with a wide variety of unique treatments, thermal suite, a design pool area flooded with natural daylight and a 24h gymnasium. While DSK Wine & Grill restaurant serves Hungarian-inspired dishes and international favourites along with a great selection of rich local wines and craft cocktauls, the Kupola Lounge is the ideal place for a rich breakfast or a relaxed Afternoon Tea, and Kupola bar is focusing on innovative cocktails and tapas style bites. The facilities are completed with a ballroom and four flexible meeting rooms with state of the art technology.Official Hotel Information

name: Ambra Hotel
description: Ambra Hotel is located right in the heart of Budapest, only 200 metres from the State Opera House, the UNESCO-protected Andrassy Avenue as well as the nearest metro station. The property offers free WiFi access. Free coffee and tea are available all afternoon at the bar. All rooms feature a satellite TV. They are air conditioned from June to September. A sauna and massage services offer relaxation.

name: Holiday Beach Budapest Wellness Hotel with Sauna Park
description: Hungary's one and only boat-shaped hotel, the Holiday Beach Budapest Wellness Hotel with Sauna Park welcomes you right at the Danube riverbank in green surroundings and offers you great pools and free WiFi access. The centre is easily reachable by public transport, the nearest bus stop is a 3-minute walk away. You can enjoy the view of the Danube and the opposite river bank covered with forests right from your hotel room at the Holiday Beach Budapest Wellness Hotel. The property features 2 restaurants, a grill terrace, a pool bar and serves hot buffet breakfast each morning. An outdoor swimming pool, a fun bath, a children's pool, 2 hot tubs for 8 people each and a soccer court are also at the guests' disposal. Keep fit in the fully equipped cardio, fitness and aerobic room, relax in the sauna area, including Finnish, bio and infrared saunas, a steam room and an aromatherapy salt room. You can also treat yourself to a visit in the beauty parlour. A wide range of conference facilities cater for the needs of business guests at the Holiday Beach Budapest Wellness Hotel. Only a few steps away you will find a number of pleasant pubs and cafeterias. The EuroVelo 6 Bicycle Road runs right on the riverside.

name: Hilton Budapest
description: Set in the heart of the Royal Castle District, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, Hilton Budapest rests on the Buda side of the city, just steps from Matthias Church and Fisherman’s Bastion. Unwind in an inviting guest room or choose an executive room for exclusive access to the Executive Lounge offering complimentary breakfast and refreshments. All room types are available with the option of stunning Danube River views, for the perfect backdrop to a comforting stay. Work out in the 24-hour fitness center or re-energize on the nearby jogging track. Feel pampered with a soothing massage or relax in the sauna. Marvel at ancient relics showcased in the hotel’s restored cloister or stroll the Castle District’s charming streets. Wake up with freshly brewed coffee, snack on light meals, or have a cool evening drink at the stylish Lobby Café & Bar. Admire magnificent panoramas from LÁNG Bistro & Grill restaurant and indulge in authentic Hungarian and International dishes.Hilton

name: Bo33 Hotel Family & Suites
description: Offering free use of a rooftop relaxing centre with sauna, as well as a small fitness area, Bo33 Hotel Family & Suites is located in Budapest. Free WiFi access is available. Each room at Bo33 Hotel Family & Suites is air-conditioned and will provide you with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a minibar. Featuring a bath tub or a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A rich champagne buffet breakfast is offered daily. Upon request, special diet menus can be also offered to the guests. Guests can relax at a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub with views and benefit from a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a luggage storage. The hotel is 800 metres from Keleti Railway Station. Andrassy Avenue and State Opera House area reachable within a 10-minute walk. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km away. Private parking is possible on site for surcharge.

name: NH Collection Budapest City Center
description: The NH Collection Budapest City Center provides serviced apartments a short walk away from Andrássy Boulevard and the Hungarian State Opera House. The modern building, situated in the Pest side of the city, is close to the Blaha Lujza underground station and Budapest Airport is a 30-minute car drive away. The residence spans seven floors filled with 138 suites, where fully equipped kitchens, spacious seating areas and complimentary Wi-Fi come as standard. Extended balconies with views of the Buda hills and across the city are also available.NH Hoteles

name: Mirage Medic Hotel
description: Just next to Heroes’ Square in the centre of Budapest, the Mirage Medic Hotel occupies a classic 19th-century building at the entrance to City Park. It provides a bar, a 24-hour front desk, and free Wi-Fi. Offering views over the city and Heroes’ Square, the Mirage Medic Hotel's air-conditioned rooms come with elegant furniture, a seating area, satellite TV, a tea and coffee-maker, and a spacious bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony. A rich buffet breakfast is served each morning. Mirage Medic Hotel offers in-house medical services with holistic healing programmes. Based on traditional Chinese therapy, the treatments include sleep and dietary adjustment, herbal remedies and acupuncture. Andrassy Avenue is only 100 metres away from Hotel Mirage Medic, and it is 200 metres to the Hősök tere Metro Station. The Széchenyi Thermal Bath is 600 metres away.

name: Rooftop City Residence
description: No description found

name: Monastery Boutique Hotel Budapest
description: Monastery Boutique Hotel Budapest is situated within 600 metres of Fisherman's Bastion, 700 metres from Chain Bridge and it is close to several noted attractions. The hotel offers 24 hour reception and free WiFi all areas. Rooms include a desk, flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, air conditioning and a wardrobe. A hearty breakfast buffet is available each morning at the hotel. Many shops, bars, cafes and restaurants can be found in the surrounding streets. Guests can enjoy cycling nearby and the reception of the property can provide tips on the area. The nearest metro station is 600 metres away. Buda Castle is 1.4 km from the hotel, while State Opera House is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 23 km from Monastery Boutique Hotel Budapest.

name: Kalvin House Budapest
description: Kalvin House is located in the historic downtown of Budapest, just a few steps from the Danube and Freedom Bridge. The Váci utca pedestrian street and the Kalvin Square metro stop are just a short walk away. Dating from the 19th century, Kalvin House Budapest offers large, individually decorated rooms with historic furniture and wooden floors. Each has satellite TV and a modern bathroom. Hairdryers are available at all rooms free of charge. Theatre tickets,car rental, airport transfers, and restaurant bookings are available at the reception.

name: Duna Garden Hotel
description: This elegant hotel is located at the foot of the Gubacsi Bridge on the Duna-Ipoly Nature Reserve in Budapest. It is set within a private garden with barbecue facilities and features a private yacht port. The rooms overlook the Danube River or the courtyard. They come with air conditioning, LCD TV and are decorated with dark wooden, sleek furniture and natural colours. Free Wi-Fi is provided in the entire Duna Hotel. This eco-friendly hotel uses geothermal energy for heating and air conditioning. The restaurant serves traditional Hungarian cuisine and sea food specialities. There is a piano bar and guests can also dine on the outdoor terrace with views of the Danube. Guests can go fishing. A shopping centre with bars and restaurants is 7 km away from the Duna Garden Hotel. Liszt Ferenc Airport is 15 km away. Free private guarded parking is available on site.

name: Barcelo Budapest
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility.Barcelo.com

name: Boutique Residence Budapest
description: Providing free WiFi, Boutique Residence Budapest is situated in the centre of Budapest. The property is around 50 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica and 700 metres from State Opera House. Local points of interest like Dohany Street Synagogue and Chain Bridge are reachable within 1.1 km and 900 metres, respectively. All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms come with a private bathroom, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. The rooms include a wardrobe. Smart continental breakfast box is served for the guests. Staff at the reception can help guests with any questions that they might have. Hungarian National Museum is 1.7 km from the hotel, while Hungarian Parliament Building is 1 km from the property. Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport is 21 km away.

name: Danubius Hotel Helia
description: The Danubius Hotel Helia can be found right on the banks of the Danube river opposite Budapest's Margaret Island and offers you great fitness, spa and conference facilities. Budapest's historic city centre can be reached within 15 minutes from the Danubius Hotel Helia. Choose from nicely furnished, non-smoking rooms, most of them overlooking the Danube river, Budapest's Margaret Island and the Buda hills. Plunge into the large pool and enjoy the breathtaking panorama from the 2-storey fitness club! There is a spacious car and bus park just outside the hotel. medical treatments, physical exercise, and medical examinations are also available at the hotel for an additional fee. The sauna is not co-ed.

name: Mercure Budapest City Center Hotel
description: Experience the taste of Budapest from one of the freshly designed rooms in our completely renovated Mercure Budapest City Center. Feel the touch of downtown and be inspired by the architectural treasures, like Basilica, Parliament or Opera. After your day in the city, refresh your body in our well-equipped fitness room or relax during a massage. Visit our fantastic Winestone restaurant and get a taste of trendy cuisine accompanied by our Hungarian wine selection.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Budapest, an IHG hotel
description: A modern gem with great access to all corners of the city. The Crowne Plaza Budapest is located right next to the Westend shopping mall and only minutes away from Budapest Nyugati train station. Margaret Island and Andrassy ut are Unesco World Heritage Sites just steps away from the Danube. The Castle District is three kilometres away. The hotel makes a perfect business venue with its 1500 square metres of meeting space divided over 13 well-equipped conference rooms including a multi-purpose ballroom with room for up to 350 people. To complement your event, we have the perfect rooftop garden for your social gatherings. Most of our rooms feature natural daylight. Audio visual equipment and catering options are available upon request. You can enjoy your workout in the hotel's Fitness Center located on the top floor and unwind in adjacent sauna. Looking for a bite to eat? Enjoy breakfast at the Cult Restaurant or join us for nibbles and bits and dinner at the Axis Café surrounded by greens.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Continental Hotel Budapest
description: The 4-star-superior Continental Hotel Budapest opened in 2010 at the former site of Hungaria Bath, a protected Art Nouveau building. Each room category boasts Art Deco style and comes with free WiFi, soundproofed windows and air conditioning. Equipment includes an LCD satellite TV with an info guide to Budapest’s main attractions. The bathrooms have a hairdryer, free toiletries, shower or bathtub. A minibar, coffee and tea-making facilities, newspapers and a laptop-size safe are also at the guests disposal. Wellness facilities include a sauna and infrared cabin. The fitness room is equipped with high-tech cardio and isotonic machines, and there is a massage service. Overlooking the grand entrance hall, Gallery Café serves traditional coffee specialities, such as the Kapucíner, with whipped cream and chocolate chips. The Hotel Continental's lobby lounge area faces the inner courtyard and offers live piano music. Araz Restaurant serves Hungarian-French dishes, uses 21st century technologies and includes a cocktail bar. Guests can also dine on the terrace located in the inner courtyard. A rich buffet breakfast is served daily. Blaha Lujza tér M2 Metro Station, on the M2 line, is 250 metres away and the Great Synagogue is 450 metres down the road.

name: Cortile Hotel - Adults Only
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Budapest, Cortile Hotel - Adults Only offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel provides an indoor pool and luggage storage space. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, while certain units at the hotel also have a balcony. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near Cortile Hotel - Adults Only include St. Stephen's Basilica, Hungarian State Opera and Dohany Street Synagogue. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Budapest City
description: The NH Budapest City hotel is conveniently located in the Újlipótváros business district on the Pest side of the Danube River. You can walk to the water, as well as the stunning Parliament building, in just 10 minutes. Margaret Island is also nearby, where you can go for relaxing walks or a fun bike ride. The famous Budapest Castle and Synagogue are a short ride away on the metro, which you can hop on at the Nyugati tér (Western Square) stop. NH Budapest City has 160 simple and comfortable rooms. Each one features high-quality mattresses, tea and coffee making facilities, and satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel and there is 24-hour room service. A breakfast buffet is served daily at the Manzanos restaurant which also offers a delicious local and international menu for lunch and dinner. You can enjoy breakfast until noon on Sundays as well as a complimentary late check-out. The Afterwork Bar is a perfect place to enjoy a glass of Hungarian wine and people watch through its floor-to-ceiling windows. For further relaxation and to stay active, there is a gym and sauna. Private parking is available on-site. The hotel also has five meeting rooms for up to 110 people.NH Hoteles

name: Gerlóczy Boutique Hotel
description: Set in a historic building from 1892, the Parisian-style Gerlóczy Boutique Hotel is located in the historical centre of Budapest. The air-conditioned rooms are decorated in Parisian-boho-chic style and have minibar included with daily refill and free Wi-Fi. Beautiful wooden floors and lavish, modern bathrooms complete the boutique atmosphere of each room. A flat-screen TV is provided in each, as well as a mix of Art Deco and modernist features. Guests can enjoy international gourmet cuisine in the fine restaurant, or on the sunny terrace facing the street. Breakfast is served á la carte and includes freshly baked breads and pastries. This guest house offers a 24-hour front desk and a safe. Concierge service is also available. The main public transport hub can be reached within a 5-minute walk. Sights such as the Great Synagogue are within walking distance.

name: Aquaworld Resort Budapest
description: Aquaworld Resort Budapest wellness and family friendly hotel is offering services unique in Budapest: it has 309 rooms, the main building has standard rooms, junior suites, family rooms and apartments. Free, unlimited internet access (Wi-Fi) in the entire premises of the hotel, as well as free outdoor car park for over 1000 cars await the arriving guests. The complex houses a three-leveled Oriental Spa wellness and fitness centre for those longing for relaxation, Bongo Kids Club for the youngest visitors and one of Europes grandest indoor water theme parks, Aquaworld for the adventurous. Aquaworld is directly accessible from the hotel. The water amusement park offers unforgettable entertainment for every age group all year round. The suspension bridges, towers and pools surrounding the replica of Angkor Wat temple provide a breathtaking sight. Visitors are transformed into explorers and can feel as if theyve fallen into a new world: tropical atmosphere, suspension bridges, palm trees, whirlpool, mountain stream, 17 indoor and outdoor kiddy and amusement pools. Adventure and adrenalin rush is guaranteed with 11 different slides, surf pool, diving and floating balls. A playground, childrens pools, childrens play corner and the Bongo Kids Club with supervision await our youngest guests.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bohem Art Hotel
description: Featuring young Hungarian artists, Bohem Art Hotel in the heart of Budapest combines the style of a hip hotel with the feel of an art gallery. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Bohem Art Hotel is only 50 metres away from the Danube River and the Vaci utca shopping street. Numerous restaurants, cafés and bars are in the vicinity. All rooms in the Bohem Art Hotel have air conditioning. They come with a minibar, a laptop safe and a flat-screen TV. Wi-Fi is available for free in all of them. Fővám Tér transport hub with metro line M4 and several tram and bus lines is within 250 metres, while taxi transfers are also available upon request.

name: Matild Palace, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Budapest
description: Matild Palace boasts a distinctive ambience representative of its Hungarian heritage, which runs beautifully through its core and is unmistakable from the moment guests step in through the front doors. Built during the Belle Epoque era, in 1902, Matild Palace was developed under the patronage of Her Imperial and Royal Highness Maria Klotild of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha to serve as the social hub of the city. She dreamed of the twin palaces to greet those who enter the bridge as a graceful lady. Renowned architects Korb and Giergl, named after projects like Liszt Ferenc Academy of Music, envisioned of neo-baroque palaces that would serve as the gateway to the Elisabeth bridge. The palace is listed as a UNESCO world heritage site and is under monumental protection. Today, the hotel is committed to inspiring guests with its rich history, culture and epicurean excellence. Combining luxurious surroundings with authentic experiences, it serves as the most spectacular gateway to exploring the magic of Budapest.Marriott

name: Bo18 Hotel Superior
description: The 3-star superior Bo18 Hotel is located only 300 metres from the Budapest’s Corvin Shopping Centre and Corvin promenade, and serves rich buffet breakfast including champagne. The hotel's wellness corner comprises Finnish and infrared sauna, hot tub and fitness facilities, which can all be used free of charge. Massage treatments are offered for an additional cost. Free WiFi access is featured throughout the hotel. A corner with a laptop and Xbox is also available for guests' convenience. The bar offers a wide variety of drinks and special wine selection 24 hours a day. Depending on the season, chilled refreshing soft drink or hot tea is provided in the hotel lobby. Guests can also benefit from the facilities of the express laundry service. Bo18 Hotel Superior is easily accessible both by public transportation and by car. The Corvin-Negyed metro station on line M3 is 450 metres away. Private parking on the premises is offered at a surcharge and upon prior request.

name: Mercure Budapest Buda
description: Whether on a family holiday or on business, you are welcome to stay at newly renovated Mercure Budapest Castle Hill, located only 4 metro stations away from the city center. You'll be able to discover a city by walk and enjoy the wonders of the Castle District. Our 250 modern superior rooms are quiet, soundproof and air conditioned. Experience the vibe of the Buda Castle mixed with an abstract art of life and a breath of emotions.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Clark Budapest - Adults Only
description: The adults-only Hotel Clark Budapest is set in Budapest and features a fitness centre. Popular points of interest nearby include Buda Castle, Chain Bridge and Matthias Church. The property is close to popular attractions like St. Stephen's Basilica, Hungarian Parliament Building and Citadella. All rooms comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, while selected rooms also feature a balcony. The hotel offers rich buffet breakfast. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site Leo Bistro, which serves excellent dishes, or at Leo rooftop bar with stunning view to the city. Hotel Clark Budapest offers a sauna. The reception can provide advice on the area in order to help guests plan their day. Citadella is 1.4 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 25 km from Hotel Clark Budapest.

name: Hotel Nemzeti Budapest - MGallery
description: In the heart of the city the 4-star Hotel Nemzeti provides you with the artistic spirit of Budapest. The hotel is located on the grand boulevard with excellent public services near the M2 metro station, 24h operating tram and several buses. Many restaurants and tourist attractions in the vicinity. All stylish, air-conditioned rooms are equipped with flat-screen TV, coffee/tea making facilities and private bathroom featuring luxury bathroom amenities. High-speed 5G Wi-Fi available for free.accorhotels.com

name: Alice Hotel
description: Boasting a garden, a terrace as well as a bar, Alice Hotel is situated in the centre of Budapest, less than 1 km from House of Terror. Located around 1.9 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.8 km away from Hungarian State Opera. The property is allergy-free and is set 500 metres from Heroes' Square. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Alice Hotel features some rooms with city views, and each room includes a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at Alice Hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving American, European and Hungarian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Staff speak German, English and Spanish at the reception. Keleti Railway Station is 1.8 km from Alice Hotel, while Blaha Lujza Square is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Budapest City Center
description: Courtyard Budapest City Center is located on the Grand boulevard, easily accessible by car or public transport. Our 4-star hotel is just 30 minutes away from the airport and 10 minutes from East Railway station. We provide a garage with a capacity of up to 200 cars and public transportation is just a few steps from our premium hotel. Andrassy Avenue, the main shopping street of Budapest is nearby the hotel and the Europeum shopping mall is in the same building. The hotel is in walking distance to the Jewish Quarter of Budapest, several museums, pubs, and ruin pubs can be found in the area. High-end restaurants and major sights of the city are also within walking distance. The hotel offers spacious guest rooms with a size of a minimum of 28 sqm. Indulge in the expertly crafted Mediterranean Oléo Pazzo Bar for dinner and stay fit and focused on our fitness centre or relax our on-site sauna and steam room. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee.Marriott

name: Hotel Castle Garden
description: The 4-star hotel Castle Garden is located in the first district of Budapest, at the famous tourist attraction of Buda Castle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is offered. The boutique-style hotel provides cosy and stylish air-conditioned rooms and a uniquely styled bistrot restaurant with a bar and a garden. Between 11:00 and 17:00 free coffee, tea and soft beverages are provided in the lobby of the hotel. The small wellness centre with sauna and hot tub makes it an ideal venue both for tourists and corporate guests. The location of the hotel guarantees a quiet location where you can enjoy the vicinity of nature in the heart of a teeming city. Airport shuttle and cleaning services such as laundry and dry cleaning are available for an additional fee. Located in the immediate vicinity of the UNESCO-protected Buda Castle, Hotel Castle Garden has its own car park and a popular restaurant with a terrace. Each room has a Chrome cast smart TV and free Wi-Fi. The cozy and elegant boutique hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and the unique Riso Ristorante & Terrace, one of the most popular restaurants in Budapest. Guests can enjoy free coffee, tea and soft drinks daily in the hotel lobby from 11:00 until 17:00. In the basement there is a mini wellness center with a sauna and a hot tub, making it an ideal place for both tourists and business guests. The hotel is located in the heart of the bustling city, yet in a peaceful green area. An airport shuttle service is available at a surcharge. Based on the unbiased reviews of our guests, this is one of the most popular parts of Budapest. Based on our location, our hotel is popular for couples! It was rated 9.5 points for two-person trips.

name: Maison Bistro & Hotel
description: Maison Bistro & Hotel in Budapest provides adults-only accommodation with a restaurant, a bar, and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers high-quality concierge services. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and organizes tours for guests. At the hotel every room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. At Maison Bistro & Hotel rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Rich buffet breakfast with a' la carte dishes is included in the price and is available every day at the accommodation. Maison Bistro & Hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Trinity Square, Fisherman's Bastion, and Matthias Church. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 19 km from Maison Bistro & Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Escala Hotel & Suites
description: Escala Hotel & Suites is situated in Budapest and offers free wireless internet. It provides a gym, as well as an express check-in and check-out feature, a playground and a rooftop terrace. Guests of this 4-star hotel can book excursions with help from the tour desk. Facilities include an all-hours reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as luxury toiletries, a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room dining area, a refrigerator and a kitchen. Escala Hotel & Suites is close to Corvin-negyed Metro Station, making it easy for guests to explore Budapest and its surrounding areas. The local area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Buda Castle Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Buda Castle Hotel Budapest offers accommodation in Budapest, 200 metres from Matthias Church. Guests can relax in the on-site bar. Every room at the hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. The rooms also include a minibar, laptop-size safe, private bathroom a hairdryer, as well as coffee and tea making facilities are also at guests' disposal. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Buda Castle is 900 metres from Buda Castle Hotel, while Chain Bridge is a 15-minute walk from the property. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 19 km from Buda Castle Hotel Budapest.

name: Danubius Hotel Astoria City Center
description: The Danubius Hotel Astoria City Center is situated in the centre of Budapest. The Astoria metro station is close by and the famous Váci utca is just a 5-minute walk from the property. The air-conditioned deluxe rooms offer lots of space and elegant antique-like white furniture. Standard rooms are situated on the Magyar street wing and feature soundproof windows. Hotel Astoria features the traditional, yet trendy Astoria Café & Restaurant. It serves excellent Hungarian delicacies as well as inventive dishes, combining Eastern and Western flavours. Guests can select from a variety of fine Hungarian wines, desserts and coffee specialities in this typical late 19th-century Budapest café. Parking is available nearby, at the Franklin Parking House.

name: Regnum Residence
description: Hotel Regnum Residence is situated close to the Danube and to Budapest's Margaret Island. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and free soft drinks from the minibar. All spacious rooms feature coffee and tea making facilities, work desks, lap-top sized safes as well as LCD TV. Some rooms have large windows with panoramic views, and some have balconies with a view. The modern Regnum Restaurant serves a rich breakfast with homemade pastry and a selection of coffee and orange juices. The Hotel Regnum Residence is only steps away from the original Turkish-style Király Thermal Bath. The area around the hotel is also well served by public transport.

name: Aria Hotel Budapest by Library Hotel Collection
description: Offering a rooftop bar with panoramic views of downtown Budapest, the non-smoking Aria Hotel Budapest by Library Hotel Collection boasts rooms and suites designed around 4 music styles and a spa centre with a pool, saunas and a hammam. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Every air-conditioned unit features a state-of-the-art multimedia system, an iPad and a Nespresso coffee machine with complimentary capsules. 4 bottles of spring water are provided each day of your stay. Most bathrooms come with a bath and a walk-in shower. Bathrobes, slippers as well as toiletries are provided. A rich complimentary buffet breakfast is served each morning in the Aria Hotel. Gratis coffee and tea are served with cookies and fruits during the day and a free wine and cheese reception is available every afternoon from 16:00 to 18:00. An extensive selection of music CDs and DVDs can be accessed in the Music Library for free. The St. Stephen's Basilica is 100 metres from the Aria Hotel Budapest, while the State Opera House is a 5-minute walk away. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 17 km from the property. Airport shuttle is available on request.

name: Budapest Marriott Hotel
description: Budapest Marriott Hotel welcomes you to Hungarys capital city with modern style and exceptional service and an unbeatable location on the Danube. Tucked along the banks of the Danube River our well known property is near some of Budapests most treasured landmarks from the Chain Bridge to Buda Castle. Intuitively designed rooms and suites all updated in a major renovation, offer scenic views of the river and home like comforts including high speed WiFi, deluxe bedding, and an ergonomic workspace. Elsewhere at our hotel you can enjoy a delectable meal at DNB Budapest or breathtaking sunsets from our Liz and Chain Sky Lounge roof bar terrace on the 9th floor. If you are planning an event in Budapest, our hotel provides 17000 square feet of versatile event space and can accommodate conferences for up to 650 guests. Our terrific city center location facilitates exploration and discovery. Visit Vaci utca and the Budapest Christmas Markets with ease.Marriott

name: Park Inn by Radisson Budapest, Hungary
description: Opened in 2012, Park Inn By Radisson Budapest offers classy air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant in the northern part of Budapest. WiFi is available for free. All rooms are decorated with vivid colours and equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety box. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, and in some of the rooms free toiletries are provided. The restaurant has been designed according to the latest trends and it serves Hungarian and international cuisine. The Park Inn By Radisson Budapest also comes with a bar offering coffees and tasty cocktails. The Duna Plaza Shopping Centre is 500 metres away as well as the Gyöngyösi utca M3 Metro Station, which takes you to the city centre within 15 minutes. The Liszt Ferenc International Airport is 22 km away. The Hajógyari Island, housing the famous Sziget Fesztival is 5 km from the premises.

name: Ibis Styles Budapest City
description: ibis Styles Budapest City is located on the bank of the Danube river near the city center offering great views to the Gellért Hill. It is a perfect location with the most comfortable access to both the financial and historical parts of the city. Have a wonderful night sleep in one of our 130 rooms that are bubbly with energy and huge comfort. All-you-can-eat tasty buffet breakfast, unlimited Wi-Fi access and many more extras that don't cost a plus: hospitality corner, special family offers and more.accorhotels.com

name: Achat Hotel Budapest
description: ACHAT Hotel Budapest is located on the Hungária körút ring road, next to the Puskas Ferenc Stadium and its M2 metro stop. Each room in the property features stylish, modern furniture, air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi, a minibar, a safety deposit box and tea and coffee making facilities. The Bistrorante Restaurant serves Hungarian and international cuisine. Computer with Internet connection and a printer are available in the lobby of ACHAT Hotel Budapest. The Papp László Sportarena is 1 km away, while the Hungexpo Exhibition Centre is 2.5 km from the premises. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Verdi Grand Hotel
description: Attractively situated in Budapest, Akeah Verdi Budapest features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Akeah Verdi Budapest. Hungarian National Museum is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 11 km from Akeah Verdi Budapest, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Corinthia Budapest
description: Standing proudly at the heart of grand Budapest, Corinthia occupies a legendary space in Budapest hospitality. Inside walls which have been standing since the late 1800s lies an elegant homage to modern luxury, with a respectful nod to the past round every corner. It is your ideal base from which to explore, with landmarks like Heroes’ Square, Buda Castle and the thermal waters of Széchenyi Baths within easy reach. A warm Corinthia welcome awaits after a day of exploring; sink into the Royal Spa, an art deco masterpiece where modern comforts sit alongside original features, before discovering an unrivalled collection of restaurants and bars including Caviar & Bull, Uncensored and Rickshaw. That’s if you can bear to leave your room of course… each of our accommodations is equipped with every luxury for an unforgettable stay. From the nearby underground and tram stops, guests can easily access all attractions. The Hungexpo Exhibition Centre is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Anantara New York Palace Budapest
description: The 5* Anantara New York Palace Budapest Hotel is situated on Erzsébet Körút boulevard. Conveniently close to the Madach Theatre, Hungarian State Opera House and the famed Chain Bridge. The Blaha Lujza underground station is a short walk away and Budapest Airport can be reached by car in 30 minutes. The building spans seven floors filled with 185 rooms, where tea and coffee facilities, large flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi come as standard. A range of rooms and suites are available with sweeping views over the city. Guests can choose from the hotel’s two restaurants, the New York Café and the Salon Restaurant or a bar menu at the Nyugat Bar. The hotel’s spa and gym offer guests the chance to relax and rejuvenate away from the city.NH Hoteles

name: Lions Garden Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa area and a restaurant, the boutique-style Lion's Garden Hotel is located in Budapest, 150 metres from the City Park. The new Museum of Ethnography, the House of Hungarian Music and the Heroe Square at the end of the Andrassy Avenue are in walking distance. Keleti Railway Station and the NEW Puskás Ferenc Stadium are both within 800 metres, while the Papp László Sports Arena and Arena Plaza are within 1.5 km from the property. The hotel is located in the diplomatic quarter, close to many embassies and faces to the 100-year-old Dominican Church. The spa facilities including a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna, are available free of charge (different opening hours!). Massage can be booked with the property for a surcharge. On the 6th floor we offer our NEW room type; DELUXE double room with balcony and shower.

name: Danubius Hotel Hungaria City Center
description: The Hotel Hungaria City Center enjoys a central location, 300 metres from the Keleti railway station. Free WiFi is available in all areas of the hotel. All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a satellite TV. Most of the exquisitely furnished rooms and suites offer superb city views. A rich breakfast buffet is served upon request every morning and fine Hungarian and international cuisine is served in the restaurants. Beauty services are provided for relaxation after a rewarding day. Underground guarded parking for private cars in the Hotel Hungaria City Center's garage is also available for your convenience for a surcharge, upon previous reservation. Please note due to a limited capacity the parking spot in the garage needs to be booked in advance. The garage is open from 6 am. to 10 pm.

name: Novotel Budapest Danube
description: The four-star Novotel Budapest Danube hotel offers a fascinating view of the river Danube and the Hungarian Parliament, one of the most beautiful buildings in Central Europe. The hotel is located on the Buda side of the river, close to the Castle and the vivid downtown  and the Buda Castle. All the 175 spacious rooms  with calm atmosphere have free Wi-Fi, air-conditioning, laptop size safe, complimentary toiletries and coffee and tea making facilities.  Upgraded rooms with Danube view are available.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Blu Beke Hotel, Budapest
description: Situated 300 metres from the Nyugati Train Station and only 500 metres from the Andrássy Avenue. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a desk and a satellite TV. The bathroom is fitted with a shower, while a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided. Some rooms also are equipped with bathtub. The property features sauna and a fitness center equipped with the latest technogy equipment. Oktogon Square with metro, bus and tram stops are only 500 metres away from the Radisson Blu Béke. The House of Terror museum is within 600 metres, while the State Opera House can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

name: The Hotel Unforgettable - Hotel Tiliana by Homoky Hotels & Spa
description: The perfect hotel for the full recreation and relaxation can be find only 15 minutes from the bustling everyday life of Budapest among the Buda Hills. The property went through full renovation and welcomes guests in a 4-star environment. The style of our hotel is unforgettable and it is unique in Budapest and surroundings of capital. We offer a modern and elegant rooms, our Etalon restaurant offers à la carte breakfast, local and international dishes, drink bar will be waiting for guests at late hours in the evening. Our large (2.5- hectare) park with trees is waiting for our kind smaller guests with lot of playgrounds, outside swimmingpool as weel as several surprises. We will make for childrens their holiday unforgettable.

name: Danubius Hotel Arena
description: The Danubius Hotel Arena is neighbouring the Laszlo Papp Sport Arena, the SYMA convention center and the famous Puskás Ferenc Stadium. Due to the short distance from the Puskás Ferenc Stadion M2 subway station, every point and train station of the city can be reached within a few minutes. There are parking facilities in front of the hotel both for cars and buses. You can choose from numerous recently refurbished rooms, make use of impressive fitness and conference facilities and plunge into the on-site pool. The newly renovated Oregano restaurant offers you delicious Hungarian and international cuisine. The helpful and friendly staff is always ready to provide you with any information you may need. The city centre is accessible by subway within a 10-minute ride.

name: City Hotel Budapest
description: City Hotel Budapest is 400 meters from the Opera and a 5-minute walk from Oktogon Metro Station. It offers free internet throughout the hotel. The guest rooms at the City Hotel Budapest are decorated in warm colours and include a flat-screen TV, a work desk and a private bathroom. Continental breakfast is available on request and several restaurants and cafés are in the immediate vicinity. There is also a spacious outdoor terrace. The reception and the lobby bar are available 24 hours a day.

name: Boutique Hotel Victoria Budapest
description: Set by the foot of the Buda Castle, directly on the Danube River bank, this boutique hotel enjoys an elevated location in the heart of Budapest. It offers rooms with free WiFi and views of the Danube and the Parliament. The modern rooms are fitted with air conditioning, an LCD TV and satellite channels and a private bathroom. The facilities also include a safety box. You can relax in the sauna and enjoy massage services on request. The front desk at Boutique Hotel Victoria Budapest is at your service 24-hours a day. Breakfast is served in the main building. You can cross the Danube on the Chain Bridge 250 metres away. Margaret Island and the Mathias Church are both reachable within a few minutes’ walk. The Batthyányi Square metro station on line M2 is 500 metres from Boutique Hotel Victoria Budapest. Private parking is possible at a location nearby at an additional fee.

name: Callas House
description: Located right next to the State Opera House in Budapest, Callas House features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Every room has a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. All rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. St. Stephen's Basilica is 400 metres from Callas House, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 700 metres from the property. The Opera Station on metro line M1 can be reached in just 30 metres. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 20 km from the property.

name: Estilo Fashion Hotel Budapest
description: This elegant pet-friendly design hotel is located on Vaci Street, Budapest's pedestrian shopping street, 50 m from the Danube River and 100 m from the Great Market Hall. It offers free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a 24-hour business centre with computers. Guests can use the banquet facilities for an additional fee. Secured parking is available for a surcharge. The lounge is decorated with wooden elements, sleek furniture and pastel colours. During the day guests are served with tea and biscuits. The soundproofed rooms are fitted with custom-designed furniture and have air conditioning. The bathrooms have bathtub or shower and they provide free toiletries. On request, in-room baby amenities, such as a baby cot or a changing table can also be arranged. Guests can store their luggage at the property free of charge and use cleaning services such as shoeshine. Ironing and laundry services are available for an additional fee. Airport shuttle is available for a surcharge. Estilo Fashion Hotel Budapest is 700 m away from the Gellért Thermal Baths, while the nearest metro station is at Fővám Tér, 200 m away. Keleti Railway Station is 3 km from the property, while Liszt Ferenc International Airport is 17 km from the Estilo. Shuttle can be organised upon request and for surcharge.

name: Four Seasons Gresham Palace
description: Built in 1906 and entirely renovated in 2004, Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace Budapest enjoys an incomparable location in front of the Chain Bridge, offering luxury units, an infinity-edge pool, a fitness room and a restaurant and bar. All rooms and spacious suites offer iPod Docking Station, satellite TV, wired and wireless internet connection and marble-covered bathrooms with a spacious bath or a shower cabin. Most of the suites are provided with a further guest bathroom and some of the rooms also feature a step-out balcony with panoramic views of the Danube River and the Castle Hill. Guests can enjoy dinner or have a drink at the Kollázs Brasserie & Bar, a contemporary European brasserie overlooking the Chain Bridge and the Danube River, which offers creative combinations of the dining experience. Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning on continental basis. Additionally, American breakfast can be requested at an extra cost. The business centre and concierge desk are at your disposal with working stations, a boardroom and scanning and printing facilities. Translating and secretarial services are on request. The Buda Castle and the Matthias Church can be reached within a 15-minute walk, while the St. Stephen's Basilica is just 400 metres from the Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace. Private parking is possible on site and airport shuttle service can be arranged as well.

name: Hotel Vision
description: Located in Budapest and with Hungarian National Museum reachable within 1.1 km, Hotel Vision provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.5 km from Gellért Hill. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. At Hotel Vision each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. The accommodation offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near Hotel Vision include Dohany Street Synagogue, Blaha Lujza Square and Budapest History Museum. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: B&b Hotel Budapest City
description: In a prime location in the centre of Budapest, B&B Hotel Budapest City provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Private parking is available on site. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. All guest rooms include a desk. A continental breakfast is available daily at B&B Hotel Budapest City. Hungarian National Museum is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 12 km from B&B Hotel Budapest City.

name: Hotel Mika Downtown
description: Hotel Mika is located in the historical Jewish quarter in the centre of Budapest, 450 metres from State Opera House. Dohany Street Synagogue is 500 metres from the property. Private parking is available 100 metres away, while free WiFi is provided. Every room is equipped with a refrigerator, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units also feature a seating area, while the apartments also have a kitchen with an oven and microwave. Each unit is equipped with a fridge. Each unit is equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Bed linen is available. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. There are several restaurants, pubs and cafés in the immediate vicinity of the property. Conference facilities can be used for an additional fee. A spa and wellness centre as well as a gym can be reached in 100 metres. St. Stephen's Basilica is 750 metres from Hotel Mika, while Hungarian National Museum is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 20 km from Hotel Mika.

name: Hotel Bara Budapest
description: Located in the green part of Buda at the foot of the Gellért hill next to the Citadella and Buda Castle, this hotel offers easy access to the centre, with the bus stop just 50 metres away. All rooms at the Hotel Bara Budapest have a private bathroom, a satellite TV and a refrigerator. Hungarian and international cuisine is served in the restaurant. Sightseeing tours, folklore evenings, boat tours, a Danube Bend (Dunakanyar) tour, and visits to a Puszta horse show can be organised on request. Garage parking is available on site at an additional cost.

name: Ensana Thermal Margaret Island
description: Uniquely situated on the quiet and green Margaret Island in the heart of Budapest, the modern Ensana Thermal Margaret Island offers free use of its large spa area, an indoor and an outdoor pool, and free WiFi access. The spa area also includes a fitness centre, and various beauty treatments and massages are offered. In the Platán restaurant with its terrace, you can enjoy gourmet and light cuisine together with magnificent views of the park. The Boróka Bar with a terrace and the Neptun bar at the swimming pool are inviting places to relax. All rooms are air-conditioned and have a balcony. A work desk, satellite TV and bathrobes are also provided.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Budapest City Center
description: Immerse yourself in the old world charm of the Hungarian capital while enjoying the contemporary comforts of Ramada by Wyndham Budapest City Center. Just 21 kilometers from Budapest Airport with easy access to public transportation, our non smoking hotel is conveniently situated in the central 5th District, minutes from attractions like Buda Castle, St. Stephens Basilica, and the Hungarian Parliament Building. Take a boat cruise along the breathtaking Danube River or peruse the stores on Fashion Street, both within walking distance.Wyndham

name: Green Hotel Budapest
