description: Only steps away from the Puskás Ferenc Stadion M2 Metro Station, this unique 4-star design hotel is next to the Hungexpo, the BOK Exhibition Hall, and the Papp Arena. Free Wi-Fi is available. The spacious, individually designed rooms at Green Hotel Budapest feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a small fridge, and a bathroom with hairdryer. In some rooms, air conditioning is available on request. The Green Hotel’s restaurant serves Hungarian and international cuisine. In the warmer months, guests can dine on the courtyard terrace. There is also a bar and a 24-hour front desk.

name: Hotel Museum Budapest
description: The Hotel Museum Budapest is situated in the heart of the city, close to National Museum and just a few steps from Váci street, the St. Steven’s Basilica and the Jewish Synagogue. All rooms include a safe, a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. A buffet breakfast is available. The hotel's lobby bar serves a wide selection of cocktails and wines. Sauna, hot tub, Turkish bath and a fitness room are available. Access to the wellness centre is included in the accommodation price.

name: K+K Hotel Opera Budapest
description: Located in Budapest, K+K Hotel Opera provides modern 4-star accommodation, as well as free Wi-Fi and a Finnish sauna. This luxury hotel is set in the heart of the city. There are a variety of amenities at K+K Hotel Opera on offer to guests, including a business centre with free internet access, massage services and a gym. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They provide a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. K+K Hotel Opera is located in the heart of Budapest’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport can be accessed via the hotel's shuttle service in under 30 minutes.Revato

name: Ensana Grand Margaret Island
description: Built in 1873 on the lush green and quiet Margaret Island in the centre of Budapest, the Ensana Grand Margaret Island offers a spacious spa area with a selection of treatments. A heated underground corridor connects the hotel to the neighbouring Ensana Thermal Margaret Island, which features one of Europe's top health spas. A hot tub, 2 pools, and various saunas and beauty treatments can be enjoyed there. The diagnostic section features various therapeutic treatments. Guests can access the spa area free of charge. The Széchenyi Restaurant offers fine dining with magnificent views of the park. International, domestic and diet cuisine, with a wide selection of Hungary's best wines, are served. Outdoor dining can be enjoyed in summer on the terrace and in the garden. In the evenings, a gypsy orchestra provides entertainment. The classically furnished rooms overlook the Danube or the magnificent park. They are all air-conditioned and have a minibar. The island stretches over 4 km and is protected leafy botanical parkland with ancient trees, a Japanese garden, and a rose garden, an open-air amphitheatre, traversed by walking and jogging tracks. Bicycles, horses, carts and electric buggies can be hired to get around. It is only a 15-minute drive away from the centre of Budapest.

name: Millennium Court, Budapest - Marriott Executive Apartments
description: Experience the beauty and history of Budapest city center with a stay at our apartment hotel, located perfectly just steps away from the main shopping area, Váci street. Marriott Executive Apartments are within walking distance of countless sights to see and do here in Hungary's vibrant capital. Choose from 66 one-bedroom, 33 two-bedroom, or 9 spacious studio apartments, all with full kitchen, flat-screen TV, a well-lit workspace and plush bedding. Apartments sizes vary between 50 and 75sqm (538 and 807sqft). Stay focused while you are enjoying our on-site hotel gym, or take advantage of our meeting rooms for up to 50 guests. Optional Continental breakfast is served at the Breakfast Lounge located on the 2nd floor. Whatever brings you here to Hungary, we know you'll feel at home at the Millennium Court, Budapest - Marriott Executive Apartments.Marriott

name: Hotel Molnár
description: Hotel Molnár's two neighbouring buildings are located in a quiet and green area of Budapest, 10 minutes by car from the centre. It offers free parking and a fitness area. Some rooms at Hotel Molnár are air-conditioned and have a balcony. They all feature satellite TV. There is also a charming garden with a swing for children. Sauna is also available for a surcharge.

name: Smart Hotel Budapest
description: Set in Budapest and with House of Terror reachable within 700 metres, Smart Hotel Budapest offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 1.5 km from Hungarian State Opera, 2 km from Dohany Street Synagogue and 2.8 km from St. Stephen's Basilica. The property is 1.2 km from Heroes' Square, and within 2 km of the city centre. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, while selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. At Smart Hotel Budapest each room has bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Smart Hotel Budapest offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, Blaha Lujza Square and Keleti Railway Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from Smart Hotel Budapest, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Leonardo Hotel Budapest
description: Located in the Ferencvaros business district, the Leonardo Hotel Budapest is only 3-metro stops away from the very centre of Budapest. It offers an on-site restaurant, a bistro and free Wi-Fi. The en-suite rooms at the Leonardo Hotel are equipped with air conditioning, safes and satellite LCD TV as well as work desks and mini-fridges. Complimentary mineral water is offered in the room upon arrival. Guests can spend their time in the gym of the hotel. The restaurant and bar serve international and national cuisine. The Hummus Bar & Bistro serves Middle Eastern specialties and Hungarian dishes. In the summer months guests can also dine on the summer terrace.

name: Baross City Hotel
description: Only 50 metres from Keleti Railway Station, Baross offers modern accommodation in a period building with an inner courtyard. Keleti Underground (line M2 and M4) as well as tram and bus stops provide direct links to the Danube River banks and the city's main sights. Staff at the Baross City Hotel – Budapest can help guests find their way around town, as well as give suggestions on local cuisine and attractions. They are available around the clock and are praised for their friendliness. Spacious guestrooms come with air-conditioning and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. All rooms include a private bathroom with a bath or shower, and most overlook the quiet courtyard. Baross City is less than a 10-minute walk from the popular Heroes’ Square and City Park. It is also adjacent to the local bus n.7 stop, which provides transport to Buda. WiFi access is free and a bicycle rack on the ground floor is available.

name: The Three Corners Lifestyle Hotel
description: The brand new The Three Corners Lifestyle Hotel is located in the centre of Budapest, 700 metres from Great Market Hall and boasts a terrace and sauna. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and paid private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units feature a seating area for your convenience. Some rooms have views of the garden or city. All rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Various cardio training machines, including treadmill, elliptical trainer and exercise bike, are available in every room type free of charge upon availability and upon previous request. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property is located 100 metres from the amazing and famous Raday street with its cozy terraces and restaurants. Hungarian National Museum is 800 metres from The Three Corners Lifestyle Hotel, while Gellért Thermal Baths is 1.2 km from the property. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km away.

name: Novotel Budapest Centrum
description: With a stay at Novotel Budapest Centrum, you'll be centrally located in Budapest, within a 10-minute drive of Hungarian State Opera House and St. Stephen's Basilica. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Moments Budapest
description: Hotel Moments Budapest offers stylish rooms, wellness facilities and an on-site restaurant which serves the breakfast for our hotel guests. The hotel is located on the iconic Andrássy Avenue of Budapest. The State Opera House is 200 metres from the property. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room comes with a private bathroom and exclusive bathroom amenities. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. The St. Stephen's Basilica is a 3-minute walk from the Hotel Moments Budapest. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 17 km from the property. Shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

name: ibis Budapest Castle Hill
description: Ibis Budapest Castle Hill awaits you with recently renovated modern guest rooms and common areas. This great value hotel is next to the Buda Castle Hill and in a great location close to shopping areas, restaurants and only 10 minutes by public transportation from the city center.accorhotels.com

name: Corvin Hotel Budapest - Sissi wing
description: Built in modern-eclectic style, Corvin Hotel Budapest Sissi Wing enjoys a quiet location 300 metres from the Grand Boulevard of Budapest and the Corvin-negyed M3 Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi connection. All rooms in the Corvin Hotel Budapest Sissi Wing are non-smoking and feature satellite TV and a a safety box. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub or a shower cabin and equipped with a hairdryer. Guests can easily reach the River Danube in a 10-minute walk or the National Theatre by taking the HÉV Suburban-railway 750 metres away. Private parking is possible on site at an additional cost.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Budapest City Centre
description: Welcome to Hilton Garden Inn Budapest City Centre, a tranquil hotel located in a side street of downtown Budapest. We are walking distance from the famous Andrassy shopping street, restaurants, coffee shops and all major sights, including Hungarian State Opera House, St. Stephen's Basilica, Hungarian Parliament and Chain Bridge. Stay in comfort in one of the modern guest rooms and suites with home-like amenities such as complimentary WiFi, a 40-inch HDTV and a mini-refrigerator. Select a spacious suite boasting a balcony with beautiful panoramic city views, some overlooking the Basilica. Accessible rooms are also available with all the standard amenities plus a few extras for your convenience. Enjoy local specialties in our Garden Grille restaurant or stop by the 24-hour Shop. Stay active in the fitness center. For small meetings and events we offer a 1,156 sq. m. conference room divisible into two.Hilton

name: Hotel Gozsdu Court
description: Just a 1-minute walk from the Deák Ferenc Square in the centre of Budapest, Hotel Gozsdu Court offers fully equipped apartments with free WiFi. Set in a renovated 19th-century building in eclectic style, it is 200 metres from the Opera House and the Andrassy Avenue. All apartments come with a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a modern kitchen. The court are situated in different buildings in the same complex. Rich hot and cold buffet breakfast is available in the restaurant and the hotel's own club lounge offers many exclusive benefits. At a surcharge, guests and kids can relax at the spa and wellness centre or workout in a gym on site. Hotel Gozsdu Court' s front desk is at guests' service 24 hours a day and the building complex offers unlimited number of parking places. Parking is available 150 meters from the hotel for an extra fee.

name: 12 Revay Hotel
description: Centrally located in Budapest, 12 Revay Hotel offers an on-site bar, 270 metres from the St. Stephen's Basilica. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. Each air-conditioned unit boasts modern furnishing and equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The apartments feature a well-equipped kitchenette for your convenience and they have a terrace with direct views of the Basilica. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower and include free toiletries and a hairdryer. The reception is at your disposal in 24 hours a day. Shuttle service and airport transfer are available on request and at an additional cost. The State Opera House can be reached within 200 metres from the 12 Revay Hotel. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 17 km from the property.

name: Hotel Charles
description: The friendly Charles hotel is situated 1.5 km from the city centre, yet with bus stops right before the door, and offers you spacious rooms with kitchenette and a great restaurant. Start your day at the rich breakfast buffet before you set out to explore the impressive Hungarian capital or for successfully doing business. In the renowned Janos hotel restaurant you can experience tasty traditional Hungarian cuisine. The helpful staff is always there to provide you with any information you may need to spend a rewarding stay in Budapest. Many major sights can be reached within a few minutes. The public bus takes guests right down to the famous Vaci street in the heart of Budapest (only 2 stops). The hotel is situated on the Buda side, only a few minutes’ walk away from Gellert Hill and not far from Castle Hill. The Keleti Train Station is to be found 4 km from the hotel, reachable easily via a bus.

name: Ibis Budapest Heroes Square
description: ibis Heroes Square welcomes guests in the cultural heart of Budapest, next to the City Park with excellent public transport connections to the city centre (Metro station: Hösök tere) and with hotel garage. The latest ibis designed public area is enhanced by its immediate proximity to the Museum of Fine Arts, Hungarian Art Gallery, Széchenyi Thermal Bath, Zoo, Heroes Square and the National Opera House. The hotel has air-cooling system, free Wi-Fi and exceptionally comfortable beds in spacious rooms.accorhotels.com

name: Opera Garden Hotel & Apartments
description: The Opera Garden Hotel & Apartments is located in a pedestrian street in the heart of Budapest, just a few blocks away from the Opera House and Andrássy Street and it offers homemade products for breakfast and a rooftop terrace with a garden, overlooking the Basilica. WiFi is available in all areas for free. All rooms and apartments are sound proofed and feature a fully equipped kitchen, a 101-cm LCD TV and free wireless internet access. Beds are equipped with 22 cm comfort-foam mattresses. The bathrooms are provided with L’occitane toiletries. Art Cool air conditioning is available in each unit. The wellness and fitness area with a sauna, a treadmill and an ergometer invites you to unwind after a day of doing business or sightseeing in Budapest. The hotel provides complimentary sangria to every guest. A free giveaway is offered to guests at the property. There are many restaurants and design shops around the Opera Garden Hotel and Apartments.

name: Roombach Hotel Budapest Center
description: Opened in April 2014, Roombach Hotel Budapest Center is located in Budapest and offers a 24-hour front desk, a lounge with a snack bar, and en-suite rooms with free air conditioning and a flat-screen smart TV. Free Wi-Fi is available. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some of the rooms have views of the courtyard. Extras include a laptop safe. Breakfast is available every morning. At Roombach Hotel Budapest Center guests will find a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage. The Gosdu Court with several restaurants, bars and pubs is just 50 metres from the hotel. Only 230 metres from the hotel, guests will find an underground station (line 1, 2, and 3). The Deák Ferenc Square is 300 metres away, and the Vaci Street as well as the Chain Bridge are both within 1 km of the hotel. Keleti Railway Station is 2 km from the hotel. The Nepliget International Bus Station is 4.3 km and the Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 17 km away.

name: Gold Hotel & Apartments
description: Located in Budapest, Gold Apartments offers free Wi-Fi and private balconies. It is a 15-minute walk from Buda Castle and Gellert Hill. All apartments of Gold Apartments provide 2 bedrooms, bathroom amenities, a hairdryer, safe and a LCD TV. Each apartment has a kitchen with a refrigerator, a coffee machine, a dining area and storage space. Guests of the Gold Apartments can make use of the services offered by the partner hotel nearby as the conference room, 24-hour reception, laundry, breakfast buffet, parking, car rental and sight seeing tours. The nearest bus stop is 100 meters from the property's entrance.

name: Cotton House Hotel Budapest
description: The Cotton House Hotel Budapest features interior design of 1920s. Nyugati Railway station is 200 metres away. Free WiFi, sauna and fitness center are offered. The rooms have a decoration of 1920s and 1930s, they also feature flat-screen TV, free toiletries and a minibar. They come with individually controlled heating and air conditioning. Some rooms offer a bath or a shower and some feature a spa bath. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, luggage storage, transfer service, fitness room and infra sauna. Buffet breakfast is served with international and local specialties. Guests can enjoy the Hotel Lobby Bar which offers refreshments, coffee specialties, selection of beer or wine. Hungarian State Opera 600 metres, while Budapest Operetta Theater is 500 metres away. The nearest airport, Budapest Liszt Ferenc International Ariport, is 17.4 km away.

name: Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt
description: Set in Budapest, less than 1 km from Dohany Street Synagogue, Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt offers accommodation featuring a fitness centre, wellness centre, private parking, bar and free WiFi. The property also offers 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, refrigerator, kettle, hairdryer and a desk. The units feature a private bathroom with a shower, bidet and free toiletries. The units also offer a terrace. Buffet breakfast is available at the property and an on-site restaurant is also available. Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt offers a terrace and an airport shuttle service at an extra cost. Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling nearby. Cafés, shops and theatres are also available nearby. The non-smoking property is located 1.5 km from State Opera House. Chain Bridge is 1.6 km from the hotel, while St. Stephen's Basilica is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 21 km from Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mercure Budapest Korona Hotel
description: Situated in the heart of the city,  Mercure Budapest Korona is suitable for both business and leisure travelers. Our well-equipped meeting rooms are ideal to host events up to 300 participants.  In our Winestone Restaurant you can taste unique local wines and authentic cuisine.  The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with Wi-Fi access. Pamper yourself and pick one of our suites with Privilege services and stunning National Museum views.accorhotels.com

name: Ibis Budapest Aero
description: ibis Budapest Citysouth is located between the airport and city centre (20 min) next to a shopping mall, opposite a metro station, offering easy access to the airport. Book one of our 139 recently refurbished A/C rooms including family rooms for up to 4 people. Our hotel offers you a unique community garden with terrace area, outdoor private car park, 24 hour bar offering homemade burgers till 10 pm, free WiFi, 66 m² / 710 ft² meeting room for seminars with direct garden access and catering possibilities.accorhotels.com

name: Sous44
description: SOUS44 is set in a historic building in Budapest and it offers accommodation and an inner courtyard with a terrace decorated by wrought-iron railings. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Each room at SOUS44 is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Several restaurants, bars and theatres can be reached in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. Dohany Street Synagogue is 800 metres from SOUS44, while Hungarian National Museum is 900 metres away. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Equity Point Budapest
description: The Equity Point Budapest housed in a renovated 19th-century building is located in the heart of Budapest, in the centre of Pest, close to many tourist attractions. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. You can choose from elegantly furnished and modernly equipped rooms, still reflecting the turn-of-the century atmosphere. The invitingly styled restaurant is a fine place to taste delicious Hungarian cuisine. All rooms are air conditioned. "Females only" rooms are also available. The property also offers a beer garden and a patio. Váci street, the Duna Corso, the Synagogue, the National Museum, the Covered Market Hall, the Opera and St. Stephan Cathedral are all easily accessible on foot.

name: Danubius Hotel Erzsébet City Center
description: Located in a pedestrian street with cafés and bars, Hotel Erzsebet City Center is only a few steps from the Vaci utca shopping street and the Great Market Hall. All rooms at the Erzsebet Hotel are air-conditioned and feature a minibar and satellite TV. The in-house MészárSteak Kitchen restaurant offers a steak menu and an á la carte menu. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site Judy's Wine Bar. The Ferenciek tere underground station is just 200 metres away.

name: Netizen Budapest Centre
description: Well situated in Budapest, NETIZEN Budapest Centre offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 200 metres from Blaha Lujza Square, 1 km from Dohany Street Synagogue and less than 1 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hostel every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at NETIZEN Budapest Centre can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include House of Terror, Keleti Railway Station and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from NETIZEN Budapest Centre.

name: Lidi Guesthouse
description: Lidi Guesthouse provides accommodation with free WiFithroughout the property in the centre of Budapest, 500 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue. The property is located 400 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica, 1 km from Hungarian National Museum and 1.7 km from Hungarian Parliament Building. The guest house features family rooms. The guest house offers certain rooms with city views, and each room has a kettle. Guest rooms include a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen. Popular points of interest near Lidi Guesthouse include Hungarian State Opera, Blaha Lujza Square and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: City Hotel Matyas
description: City Hotel Matyas is located in the heart of Budapest, just 50 metres from Váci utca featuring exclusive shops and restaurants. Each room has a TV, work desk and free WiFi. Free toiletries can be requested at the reception. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk.

name: Sarokhaz Panzio
description: The Sarokház Panzió is only 5 minutes away from the Budapest Ferihegy Airport and features a tennis court on its own grounds and a large parking area, which is cheaper than the airport parking lots. You can choose from nicely furnished and air-conditioned rooms with balconies. The Gusto restaurant serves international and Hungarian specialities daily from 06:00 to 22:00. The wellness centre offers hot tub and infrared sauna facilities as well as massage treatments. For guests who want to leave their cars at the Sarokhaz guest house, an airport shuttle is available at an extra charge.

name: H2 Hotel Budapest
description: Thank you for choosing our Trademark Hotel Collection property. Enjoying a warm welcome. Savoring a perfect pour. Sinking into plush bedding. A serene stay with a Wyndham Hotel Group Property make up the moments that create memories to last a lifetime.Wyndham

name: The Aquincum Hotel Budapest
description: The outstanding Aquincum Hotel Budapest - where inspiration meets tradition - is located in a prime area alongside the Danube on the Buda side of the city, facing Margaret Island. The Aquincum Hotel Budapest offers easy access to the city centre. The hotel is surrounded by medieval streets, wine bars, restaurants and its own green park. All bedrooms are air-conditioned and come with free wired and wireless internet access, and bathrobes in each bathroom. The Aquincum Hotel Budapest provides a fine restaurant which offers Hungarian and international cuisine, and a bar is also available. Aronia Wellness Centre & Spa offers relaxation in thermal pools, and a selection of unique treatments. The spa provides facilities such as an indoor pool, two thermal pools and saunas. Guests can also get active in the fitness room.

name: Star City Hotel
description: Star City Hotel is located 400 meters from both the neo-romantic City Park and the Keleti Train and Metro Station of Budapest. The hotel provides free WiFi throughout. Overlooking either the inner courtyard, or a quiet side-street, rooms at Star City Hotel are equipped with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Air conditioning is standard and adjoining rooms are available upon request. Breakfast is served daily and an in-house bar is available for drinks and lattes. Staff can advise on nearby attractions and each guest receives a free welcome map of the city upon arrival. The elegant Andrassy Avenue is only a 10-minute walk from the Star City. The nearby metro stop gives direct access to Budapest city centre.

name: Casati Hotel - Adults Only
description: Housed in an 18th-century building, the adult-only Casati Budapest Hotel is a boutique hotel located in the historic Terézváros District of Budapest. The hotel won the Hungarian Hotel of the Year Award in the 3-star category in 2019. It features a landscaped courtyard and interiors decorated with original works of art. The rooms and suites at Casati Budapest Hotel are designed in 4 different themes: Classic, Cool, Natural and Heaven. Guests are greeted with a welcome drink and can choose the style of their room, which is subject to availability. Most of Budapest's main sights are situated within walking distance of the hotel - the Opera, the Saint Stephen's Basilica, the theatres of Pesti Broadway, the Andrássy street and the cafes and restaurants of the Liszt Ferenc Square. The city centre pedestrian areas and the business district can all be reached within a 5- to 10-minute walk.

name: Hotel Ferihegy
description: The Ferihegy hotel is located in quiet surroundings, a 10-minute drive from Budapest Airport. It offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms, free parking and a 24-hour reception. Breakfast is served every day from 7:00 to 10:00. You can have a relaxing drink at the well-stocked bar before spending a peaceful night's sleep in your room at the Hotel Ferihegy. The hotel offers airport transfers and long-term parking for an additional fee. Car hire can be arranged at the reception.

name: Pal's Hostel And Apartments
description: Offering tastefully furnished accommodation units in the very centre of Budapest, the pet-friendly Pal's Hostel and Apartments is situated right in front of the St. Stephen's Basilica. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Most of the rooms at Pal's offer views of the city and private bathroom, while some are provided with shared bathroom facilities. The studios and the apartments are fitted with a kitchen or a kitchenette for self-catering. A shared kitchen is also available for all guests, equipped with a toaster, a kettle, a microwave and a refrigerator. Towels and bed linen are provided. Airport shuttle and laundry service can be used for an additional fee. Guests can play board games and table football at Pal's Hostel. The State Opera House is 500 m from the property. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is located 17 km from the property. Airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.

name: Avenue Hostel
description: Opened in July 2014, Avenue Hostel is located directly at the Andrassy Avenue in the heart of Budapest. The hostel awaits guests with free WiFi, shared kitchens and a snack bar. Within 2 minutes on foot, an underground (line 1) and tram stop (lines 4, 6) can be reached. The bathrooms are for shared use and situated in the corridor, while some rooms are equipped with private bathrooms. The property’s front desk is staffed 24 hours a day and the building is equipped with a lift. Guests can reach the Nyugati Railway Station within 7 minutes on foot. The Danube is 1.5 km away and the Buda Castle is within 2 km.

name: Emerald Hotel
description: Attractively located in Budapest, Emerald Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and coffee machine, while some rooms include a terrace and others also boast city views. The rooms have a desk. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. Emerald Hotel offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Dohany Street Synagogue, Hungarian State Opera and St. Stephen's Basilica. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Emerald Hotel.

name: Made Inn Budapest
description: The modern Made Inn Budapest is located in the Gozsdu Court, right behind the Great Synagogue and a 5-minute walk from the Deák Ferenc Square. All apartments are soundproofed and feature free WiFi. Various bars are at the same building. All apartments come with a flat-screen TV and soundproofed windows.Hot and cold buffet breakfast is available in the restaurant and the hotel's own club lounge offers many exclusive benefits. Breakfast and other meals are available in the restaurant on the ground floor. The front desk is at your service 24 hours a day and the building complex offers unlimited number of parking places. At a surcharge, guests can relax at the spa and wellness centre or workout at the gym on site. Parking is available 150 meters from the hotel for an extra fee.

name: Royal Park Boutique Hotel
description: Located a 10-minute walk from Budapest’s Andrassy Ut Boulevard, this boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free wired internet. Keleti Railway Station and the metro station are opposite the hotel. Opened in June 2010, Royal Park Boutique Hotel ‘s rooms are fitted with contemporary furnishings and bedding. Each room is air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe and a minibar. A rich breakfast buffet is served in the morning and the lobby awaits the guests with a café. The Budapest city centre with the St. Stephen's Basilica and the famous Parliament at the shores of the Danube can be reached within a 5-minute metro ride from Royal Park Boutique Hotel. Budapest International Airport (Ferihegy) can be reached within a 40-minute drive with a shuttle bus or a taxi. Guests arriving by car can park in the hotel’s own garage. Free access to Wi-Fi is available in the lobby.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Budapest
description: Conveniently located in the middle of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Budapest. It also provides free wireless internet. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Facilities include an all-hours reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Body Rock. The rooms at Hard Rock Hotel Budapest are air-conditioned and include a coffee maker, ironing facilities and a mini bar. Those staying at Hard Rock Hotel Budapest can dine on local and international cuisines at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. The hotel is close to Budapest-Nyugati Railway Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Budapest and its surrounding areas. The Dohany Street Synagogue, Hungarian Parliament Building and Deak Ferenc Ter are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hotel Memories Oldtown
description: Situated in Budapest, a 5-minute walk from the Great Market Hall, Hotel Memories OldTown offers a wellness area with a fitness centre. At the hotel, the rooms feature hand-made, industrial or vintage furniture. All units have a desk, a flat-screen smart cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, a cosmetic mirror and free toiletries. Guest rooms at Hotel Memories OldTown feature air conditioning, a Nespresso coffee machine, a kettle and a wardrobe. Guests can enjoy rich buffet breakfast from fresh ingredients purchased from selected producers and suppliers. Hotel Memories OldTown offers a wellness centre with a Finnish sauna, a hot tub, fitness corner and a massage room. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Hotel Memories OldTown. Speaking both English and Hungarian, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Hungarian National Museum is 230 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 20 km from Hotel Memories OldTown.

name: Ibis Styles Budapest Center
description: ibis Styles Budapest Center is located in the heart of Hungary's capital in a beautiful historical building. It is a perfect location with the most comfortable access to both the financial and historical parts of the city. Have a perfect night sleep in one of our comfortable 130 rooms filled with energy. All-you-can-eat buffet breakfast, unlimited Wi-Fi access and many more extras that don't cost extra: kids' corner, special family offers with games and other surprises.accorhotels.com

name: Corvin Residence Apartments
description: Corvin Residence Apartments offers accommodation within 2.6 km of the centre of Budapest, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Private parking is available on site. All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and coffee machine. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Corvin Residence Apartments include Hungarian National Museum, Blaha Lujza Square and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Golden Park Budapest
description: Hotel Golden Park Budapest is centrally located in the heart of Budapest's business district, close to many tourist attractions and just opposite the East Railway Station (Keleti pályaudvar). Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Syma Hall, Puskás Aréna and Aréna Plaza, one of Central Europe's largest shopping centres, are only a few minutes' walk away. All the important sights are easily reachable. The impressive 100-year old building of Hotel Golden Park Budapest features a stunning facade and houses elegantly furnished rooms with soundproofed windows and a separate non-smoking floor.

name: Hotel City Inn
description: Located 100 metres from a shopping centre and 500 metres from the Corvin-negyed Metro Station in Budapest, Hotel City Inn offers a 24-hour bar, a furnished terrace and a free sauna. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. Each room features air conditioning and comes with a flat-screen satellite TV, coffee and tea making facilities, a kettle, a desk, a telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony or terrace. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning. There are numerous cafés, restaurants and bars in a radius of 300 metres. The nearest grocery store is set within 100 metres of Hotel City Inn. There is a children’s playground on the premises. The property also provides free luggage storage, as well as 24-hour reception services. The Great Market Hall can be reached in 1.4 km, while the Hungarian National Museum is 1.3 km from Hotel City Inn. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is at the distance of 18 km.

name: City Hotel Pilvax
description: Situated in the pedestrian area in the heart of Budapest, in a quiet street devoid of traffic, the Pilvax Hotel is just a few minutes' walk from bustling Váci Street. There is a free internet corner in the lobby and free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms. The Ferenciek tere metro stop is just 2 to 3 minutes away, providing easy access to the main sights of the impressive Hungarian capital. Comfortable, air-conditioned rooms invite you to relax after a busy day doing business or sightseeing. Free toiletries can be requested at the reception.

name: Walzer Hotel
description: The charming Hotel Walzer can be found surrounded by mansions and greenery on the Buda side of the Hungarian capital, within easy reach of Budapest's city centre.Wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge. The castle-like, thoroughly renovated building includes a sauna, a restaurant serving tasty Hungarian and international cuisine, and a bar. Unlimited coffee and tea are included in the room rate. You can park your car for free on the site of the Walzer Hotel. Hotel Walzer is situated 8 km from the International Bus Station Népliget, 8.3 km from Syma, 9.7 km from Hungexpo and 18 km from the airport. The tram station is 20 meters from the hotel towards Széll Kálmán Tér transport hub and the Déli Train Station. The city center is 6 km from the hotel, 30 minutes by public transportation.

name: Hotel Memories Budapest
description: Hotel Memories Budapest is situated in 30 metres from Dohány Street Synagogue in Budapest. Built in 1900, the property is within 100 metres from Deak Ferenc Square interchange metro station. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. Featuring a fitness corner with infrared sauna, the rooms in the hotel are equipped with a mini fridge, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a capsule coffee machine, and in some of the rooms Shabbat facilities. All rooms include a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. A rich buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. Coffee and other beverages are available all day long in the club lounge free of charge. There is also an a la carte restaurant on site. Guests can also use the conference facilities for an additional fee. Computer is available for guests to use. Parking is available 150 meters from the hotel for an extra fee. Hungarian National Museum is a 7-minute walk from Hotel Memories Budapest, while St. Stephen's Basilica is an 8-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Canada Hotel Budapest
description: Easily accessible from the motorways and Ferihegy Airport and completely renovated in 2018, Canada Hotel Budapest is 1.5 km from Rákóczi Bridge and the Palace of Arts. It offers free WiFi throughout the property and private parking. All rooms at the Canada Hotel Budapest are equipped with a private bathroom, flat-screen satellite TV and a work desk. Air-conditioning is available in all rooms. Ironing services as well as luggage storage is available at the hotel. The Canada is situated directly at the Ken utca suburban railway station, offering good connections to the historical centre of Budapest.

name: a&o Budapest City
description: Attractively located in the centre of Budapest, a&o Budapest City features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Dohany Street Synagogue, Hungarian State Opera and Keleti Railway Station. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and an ATM for guests. Guest rooms in the hostel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests at a&o Budapest City can enjoy a continental or a vegetarian breakfast. Speaking German, English and Hungarian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Blaha Lujza Square, House of Terror and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from a&o Budapest City.

name: Mystery Hotel Budapest
description: Mystery Hotel Budapest is a historically themed luxury hotel located in the 6th district in downtown Budapest, in an eclectic palace built in the 19th century. This 5-star hotel offers free WiFi and in-house spa and wellness area. Hungarian State Opera is 900 m away and St. Stephen's Basilica is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Guests at Mystery Hotel Budapest can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast in the Great Hall Restaurant & Lounge which also serves international cuisine. Rooms and suites at Mystery Hotel Budapest are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine, shower, free toiletries and a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while selected rooms also feature a seating area. Guest rooms at the hotel have individually controlled air conditioning and a wardrobe equipped with a hair dryer.

name: Wombat's City Hostel Budapest
description: Set in the centre of Budapest, right opposite the bustling Gozsdu Udvar with several cafés, bars and restaurants, Wombat's The City Hostel Budapest offers a bar, vending machines and air-conditioning. Deák Ferenc Tér, where three metro lines and several bus and tram lines meet, is within 300 metres. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas. There are en-suite rooms and beds in mixed dormitory rooms at Wombat's The City Hostel Budapest. A locker is provided for each guest. Linen is included, and towels can be requested at the reception for a fee. The 24-hour hostel has a common kitchen, a laundry room and there are billiard facilities,We have a new Café! There are several grocery stores in a radius of 250 metres. Kazincy Utca ruin pub area can be reached within 300 metres and Szimpla Kert is 650 metres away. The Wombats is 300 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica Square and 800 metres from the Chain Bridge. Liszt Ferenc Airport is situated 20 km away. There is a direct bus to the airport from Deak.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Budapest M-Square
description: The Leonardo Boutique Hotel Budapest M-Square is situated in the heart of the city, about 150 metres from the Deák Square, the Budapest's main subway hub. It offers free WiFi. All stylish, air-conditioned rooms come equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels, coffee and tea making facilities. Some have a separate living room and a bedroom area and some rooms come with terrace. A breakfast is available each morning at the Leonardo Boutique Hotel Budapest M-Square.

name: Up Hotel Budapest
description: Set in Budapest, 300 metres from House of Terror, Up Hotel Budapest offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms come with a kettle, while some rooms come with a balcony and others also have city views. At Up Hotel Budapest all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. At Up Hotel Budapest guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Blaha Lujza Square, Hungarian State Opera and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Up Hotel Budapest.

name: Budapest Csaszar Hotel
description: The Csaszar Hotel is located in the centre of Buda, a 5-minute walk away from Margaret Bridge and several restaurants. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi. The building was erected in the 1850s, and initially functioned as a nunnery. The atmosphere of the rooms is pleasant and modern, yet they are reminiscent of the origins of the building. The Lukács Thermal Bath is just 150 metres away from the Csaszar hotel and provides a full range of therapeutic services. The famous Gellért Bath is easily accessible by public transport within 15 minutes. If you wish to stay on half-board basis, this can be arranged with a nearby restaurant. Moreover all guests of Hotel Császár enjoy discounted prices there.

name: Evergreen Budapest Guest House
description: Located in an authentic, historic building in Budapest, Evergreen Budapest Guest House provides spacious rooms with private bathrooms and cable TV. Free WiFi access is available. Breakfast is served each morning and coffee and tea is available throughout the day in the lounge area. Towels for outside use (thermal bath, pools) are provided free of charge on request as well. All rooms feature parquet floors and are decorated in traditional style. Within easy walking distance from the guest house there are various restaurants, pubs and cafés, while a shopping centre is 300 metres from the premises. The Hungarian Parliament Building is 1 km away. The property can also arrange bike rental and car hire. Nyugati Train Station is 300 metres away, where metro line M3 and the non-stop tram line 6 intersect. The airport is about a 45-minute ride from the Evergreen Budapest Guest House and an airport shuttle can be arranged for a surcharge.

name: Corvin holiday Apartments hotel
description: Offering balcony and views of the garden, Corvin holiday Apartments hotel is located in Budapest, 170 metres from the Corvin Plaza shopping centre with numerous restaurants, shops, as well as a wellness and fitness centre. Private parking is available but limited on site and free WiFi access is provided. Each accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven, microwave and fridge. There is also a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer in every unit. Great Market Hall is 1.7 km from Corvin holiday Apartments hotel, while Chain Bridge is 3.3 km away. Klinikák Metro Station on line M3 is at the distance of 450 metres, while the Grand Boulevard with the non-stop tram line 6 is reachable in 700 metres. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Boulevard City Panzió - self check-in
description: Situated just behind the Grand Boulevard and within walking distance to the main sights, you will find the Boulevard City Panzió - self check-in in a quiet area in the middle of Budapest. The Boulevard City Panzió - self check-in is situated on the top floors of an apartment building, close to the Petöfi Bridge on the Pest side of the city. The main shops, restaurants and attractions of Budapest are reachable on foot. Every room at this guest house is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. You will find a kettle in the room. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer.

name: art'otel budapest, by park plaza
description: Situated in the centre of Budapest, right on the banks of the Danube river, the Park Plaza Budapest offers panoramic views of the Danube, the Fisherman's Bastion and other famous sights. Wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge and you enjoy free access to the sauna and the fitness facilities. You will find a complimentary newspaper in your room. Suites also offer complimentary coffee and tea making facilities, luxury cotton bathrobes and a welcome bottle of mineral water. The Bar offers coffee specialities and cakes. Breakfast, is available at the Drawing Room Restaurant every morning and includes fresh fruit, croissants, coffee specialities and yoghurt. It takes you only a 10-minute walk to reach the World Heritage site of the Buda Castle as well as the pedestrianized shopping area. You can park your car on site.

name: Airport Almáskert Panzió
description: Located in Vecsés, Airport Almáskert Panzió offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as access to a garden with barbecue. A fridge and kettle are also featured. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Airport Almáskert Panzió provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Hungarian National Museum is 19 km from the accommodation, while Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 3 km from Airport Almáskert Panzió.

name: Island Hostel Budapest
description: Island Hostel Budapest has a cheerful atmosphere and is located on the car-free Margaret Island, surrounded by nature. You can make pleasant memories on our comfortable 200 m2 terrace, which is bathed in special lights overlooking the Danube and the Parliament building, and is excellent for spending your free time. Our common kitchen is fully equipped, suitable for baking and cooking. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the building. The rooms are functionally furnished, have a private bathroom, and the dormitories have shared bathroom facilities and most rooms equipped with USB charging facilities and reading lights. The Palatinus Beach is 200 metres from the hostel. The stop of trams 4 and 6 running through the city is located 750 m from the hostel and can be reached by walk. Palatinus Beach is 200 meters away. Bus 26 to the city center is 260 meters away. The Parliament building and the tram to Buda Castle can also be reached by walk. Public parking is available for an additional fee and 15 minutes walk from the accommodation.

name: Dean's College Hotel
description: Well set in the centre of Budapest, Dean's Home Budapest provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is set 2.8 km from Dohany Street Synagogue, 3 km from Blaha Lujza Square and 3 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.8 km from Hungarian National Museum. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, while some rooms here will provide you with a kitchen fitted with a microwave. At Dean's Home Budapest each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play billiards at this 3-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Speaking German, English and Hungarian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Keleti Railway Station is 3.4 km from Dean's Home Budapest, while Hungarian State Opera is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Benczur
description: Situated in the embassy quarter of Budapest, Benczur Hotel provides a peaceful spot in the centre of this busy city. It has a lovely garden and a restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the house. Located just a 5-minute drive from Oktogon Square, all rooms at Hotel Benczur have satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel’s Zsolnay Restaurant serves a combination of traditional Hungarian food, innovative modern cuisine and vegetarian dishes. During the summer, guests can also dine on the beautiful garden terrace. The closest metro station is Bajza Utca, located on the M1 metro line, 350 metres away. Numerous attractions are a short walk away, the Budapest Zoo is 900 metres from the property, the City Park is 10 minutes and the Széchenyi thermal bath is 15 minutes away on foot.

name: T62 Hotel
description: Attractively set in Budapest, T62 Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Dohany Street Synagogue, Blaha Lujza Square and Hungarian Parliament Building. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star hotel. Speaking German, English, Spanish and Hungarian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near T62 Hotel include House of Terror, St. Stephen's Basilica and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Soho Boutique Hotel
description: Soho Boutique Hotel located between the Eastern and Western train stations is surrounded by trendy boutiques, great restaurants and impressive sights. The 76 guest rooms - including 8 junior suites - are all well-equipped with soundproofed windows and LCD TVs featuring numerous film channels. The Boutique Hotel Soho meets every need for style and elegance and is situated in the vicinity of the city’s pulsing cultural scene, entertainment and nightlife. The Danube, Váci street, the Synagogue, Budapest’s “Broadway”, the best restaurants, theatres and concert halls are all located nearby and easily accessible thanks to the excellent public transport system in the area. The distinctive atmosphere of the Soho hotel combines stylish comfort with sensual elegance.

name: Irini Panzió
description: The family-run Irini Panzió is located in a quiet green area of Budapest, a 5-minute walk from the Kispest Train Station. It offers air-conditioned studios, free Wi-Fi and free parking. All studios have a fully equipped kitchen, a minibar and individually controllable air-conditioning. After a day of doing business or sightseeing you can relax at the bar with your favourite drink. The reception is open 24 hours a day. Budapest's Ferihegy Airport is 8 km away. The Irini guest house offers an airport transfer service. The M3 metro station can be reached within a 10-minute tram ride with tram number 50. From the metro station, the city centre is a 20-minute ride away.

name: City Hotel Unio Superior
description: Boasting a central spot 80 metres from the Grand Boulevard, City Hotel UNIO superior is a 3-star superior hotel within easy walking distance of all historic sights and with great public transport links. All rooms feature double glazed windows providing for a peaceful night's rest. Benefit from the impressive meeting facilities of the City Hotel UNIO superior which cater for up to 50 people. The 2 conference rooms offer air-conditioning and are ideal venues for business and leisure occasions.

name: Baltazár Boutique Hotel by Zsidai Hotels
description: Located above an à la carte grill restaurant in the Castle area, Baltazár Budapest provides tastefully furnished en suite accommodation units. Free WiFi is available in each unit. All rooms and suites are individually decorated with warm colours and elegant furniture, as well as cable TV and a small fridge. The bathrooms come with a shower cabin or a bathtub. À la carte breakfast is available in the restaurant on request. Daily breakfast is included in your reservation: freshly baked croissants, jam and butter, one glass of orange or apple juice, one hot drink – specialty coffee or a tea, and a bottle of clean water. The Hungarian National Gallery is a 15-minute walk from the Baltazár Budapest, while the River Danube is 1 km away. The Parliament and the downtown of the Pest side can be reached within 30 minutes on foot. Public parking is possible on site.

name: Vitae Hostel
description: Situated in Budapest and with Blaha Lujza Square reachable within less than 1 km, Vitae Hostel features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is close to House of Terror, Keleti Railway Station and Hungarian National Museum. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a shared kitchen. Rooms come with a shared bathroom with a shower, while some rooms include a kitchen with a fridge. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Dohany Street Synagogue, Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Vitae Hostel.

name: Silver Crown Hotel & Residence
description: Set in Budapest, within 0.4 km of Dohany Street Synagogue and 0.7 km of Hungarian National Museum, Silver Crown Residence features accommodation with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is offered. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Great Market Hall is 1.2 km from the aparthotel, while State Opera House is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 21 km from Silver Crown Residence.

name: Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa
description: Situated in Budapest, 1.2 km from Hungarian National Museum, Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, 1.7 km from Keleti Railway Station and 1.6 km from Dohany Street Synagogue. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge. At Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. You can play billiards at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. Blaha Lujza Square is less than 1 km from Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World, while House of Terror is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Bliss Hotel & Wellness
description: This 4-star superior hotel is located in the centre of Budapest, a 2-minute walk from Oktogon Metro Station. It features an indoor pool, a hot tub and modern rooms and apartments. The Bliss Hotel & Wellness has a wellness/fitness area with a swimming pool, sauna and a massage area. A spacious fitness centre with a personal trainer is also on site. Each accommodation unit has free access to WiFi. A flat-screen TV is also provided. The contemporary bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer. Bliss Hotel & Wellness is close to shops, cafés and restaurants. Secured private parking is available at the hotel against a fee. Bicycles can be rented at the property for a surcharge, and free walking city tours can be organised.

name: Queen's Court Hotel & Residence
description: The Queen’s Court Hotel & Residence is ideally located in the heart of Budapest and it boasts a lavish retro-classical spa area with indoor pool and a hot tub. A quiet garden in the courtyard invites all guests to relax. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. The Queen’s Court provides spacious, individually designed suites with balconies, air conditioning and kitchenettes. Some also have a spacious living room and a dining area. The in-house Chess Restaurant & Bar serves international cuisine and fine wines. The Blaha Lujza tér M2 Metro Station is 650 metres from the property, while the Deák Ferenc tér hub, as well as the St.Stephen's Basilica can be reached within a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Stories Boutique Hotel
description: Conveniently located in the 06. Terézváros district of Budapest, Stories Boutique Hotel is set 500 metres from Hungarian State Opera, 1.2 km from Blaha Lujza Square and 1.2 km from House of Terror. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Stories Boutique Hotel all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Hungarian. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Stephen's Basilica, Hungarian National Museum and Hungarian Parliament Building. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from Stories Boutique Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Medos Hotel
description: Fully renovated in 2013, the Medos Hotel is situated off Andrássy Avenue, just 100 metres away from Liszt Ferenc tér and the Oktogon Metro Station. Wi-Fi is available for free. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. All rooms are air-conditioned, and some have a balcony with views of the city. Most of Budapest's main sights are reachable within a 5- to 10-minute walk from the Medos Hotel. These include the Opera House, the Danube River and the Saint Stephen's Basilica. Private parking is available at a location nearby, for an additional fee.

name: Alfréd Panzió
description: Our reception is open from 07:30 until 20:30. If the arrival time is beyond our opening hours, than we send access codes and some informations how can occupy a room. The Alfred Panzio is located 10 km from the centre of Budapest, which is easily accessible by public transport, and offers you a familiar atmosphere. The beautiful open-air baths Romai and Csillaghegyi are situated in the immediate vicinity and you can reach the Danube banks within a few minutes' walk. A conference hall is available for meetings of up to 35 people and wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge. After a day of sightseeing or doing business you can fully relax in the sauna on site.

name: Hotel Gloria Budapest
description: This pet-friendly hotel is located in Budapest and features free Wi-Fi. It also offers a currency exchange, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Hotel Gloria Budapest, such as luggage storage, a ticket service and a tour desk. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, a wake-up service and a laundry service are available upon request. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a refrigerator, and boast views of the garden. They are all soundproofed and include a telephone, an in-room closet and a ceiling fan. Hotel Gloria Budapest's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner, providing guests with an easy dining experience near their room. Hotel Gloria Budapest is close to Nepliget Metro Station and Nagyvarad Ter Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Budapest and its surrounding areas. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to ensure that every guest has an enjoyable stay.Revato

name: Agape Apartments
description: No description found

name: Nova Apartments
description: Located in the centre and just 300 metres from Blaha Lujza Square and the underground station, the Nova Aparthotel is a great base for exploring the city, providing utmost independence. The comfortable apartments are air conditioned with a fully equipped kitchen, large living room and free WiFi. The property is ideal for people wanting to be close to several tourist attractions including the State Opera House, Heroes Square and St Stephens Basilica. There are numerous dining options in the surroundings, including Italian, Hungarian and Asian cuisine. Guests will find many bars and clubs nearby. The Nova Aparthotel is housed in a brand-new building which has a 24-hour reception on Friday and Saturday. Free bicycle and DVD rental is also available on site.

name: Corvin Plaza Apartments & Suites
description: Located at Kisfaludy Street just around the corner from the vibrant Grand Boulevard, Corvin Plaza Apartments & Suites features modern, stylish accommodation units and free Wi-Fi in the whole building. It is 300 metres from the Corvin-Negyed M3 Metro Stop and the tram no. 4-6. An LCD TV, a sofa bed, and a dining area are standard facilities in each apartment. The kitchens are fully equipped and include basic cooking ingredients like salt and pepper. The bathrooms are coming with a hairdryer. Air conditioning is available in some units on request and for surcharge. A playground for children is also featured in the courtyard of the building. Numerous restaurants, cafés and bars can be found in the nearest vicinity of the Corvin Plaza, as well as within walking distance. Corvin Sétány Shopping Centre is 400 metres away, and the central Váci Street and Vörösmarty Square can be reached in a 20-minute walk. Private parking is possible on site. The reception offers tickets for a wide range of sightseeing tours, to the thermal baths, concerts and other cultural programs.

name: Classic Hotel
description: The Classic Hotel is situated at the foot of the Buda Hills in a calm and elegant neighbourhood, with easy access to the motorways (M1/M7) and the city centre of Budapest. All rooms are equipped with free WiFi, an LCD TV with satellite channels, a mini fridge, a private bath or shower, free toiletries, a hairdryer, a wardrobe. The apartments come with coffee machine, and mini kitchen. Some rooms are equipped with air conditioning. Fully equipped conference facilities are also available on the site with free WiFi in the entire property.The hotel offers rich buffet breakfast with hot and cold meals, and free coffee. The reception can provide further advice in order to help you to plan your day better. Rudas and Gellért Themal Baths are 2 km from the property, while Buda Castle is 2.1 km. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport 18.5 km away.

name: Jazzy Vibes Parliament Rooms and Ensuites
description: Located in one of the nicest and safest areas of downtown Budapest next to the Parliament, several major sights and the Danube, Jazzy Vibes Parliament Hostel & Ensuites offers you cosy and clean accommodation. The Kossuth square metro station is also next to the hotel, so everything is easily accessible. Jazzy Vibes Parliament Hostel & Ensuites is situated on the second floor of a nice, historic Pest building, offering double, twin, triple rooms. Three rooms have a shared bathroom and 2 rooms come with private bathroom. There is a living room connected to a big guest kitchen which is very well equipped with an oven, a microwave, a fridge and a washing machine. There is also a nice terrace where smoking is allowed. The multi-lingual staff is happy to assist you in every respect. Free wireless internet access is provided in all rooms. There you also find a satellite TV. Bike rental is available as well. A 24/7 coffee shop is situated in the same building, offering premium coffee and an impressive beer selection. A supermarket can be found just 30 metres away and restaurants, bars and clubs and cash machines can be found within a 100-metre radius from Jazzy Vibes Parliament Hostel & Ensuites.

name: Hotel Sissy Residence
description: Situated in Budapest, 1.5 km from the centre and 400 metres from Blaha Lujza Square, Hotel Sissy Residence features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. The bed and breakfast provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near Hotel Sissy Residence include Dohany Street Synagogue, Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Prince Apartments
description: Situated in Budapest and with the Danube River reachable in 1 km, Prince Apartments offers accommodation with modern facilities, as well as a helpful front desk, a garden and a business centre. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Most of the apartments come with a balcony and a garden view. Some of the units contain a seating area with a sofa bed, a flat-screen satellite TV and a DVD-player. Each also includes a well-fitted kitchenette with a microwave. Shuttle transports can be arranged at an additional cost. Other surcharged services available for guests include luggage storage, dry cleaning and ironing service. The nearest tram stop is reachable within 200 metres and the metro line 3 is located 400 metres away. The Corvin Plaza is situated 200 metres away and the Historical Museum can be reached within 900 metres. The Grand Market Hall and the Gellért Thermal Bath are in a radius of 1.8 km from the apartments.

name: The Amberlyn Suite Hotel
description: No description found

name: 7x24 Central Hostel
description: This hostel is 400 metres away from Budapest's St. Stephen's Basilica at Deak Square. 7x24 Central Hostel features free Wi-Fi, free safes at the reception and a common kitchen. Deak Square is a good starting point to explore Budapest - 3 metro lines meet there. There are many pubs, clubs and restaurants in the vicinity. The 7x24 Central provides a fully equipped common kitchen with an oven and stovetop. On request, breakfast is possible at a cafe in the immediate vicinity of the hostel. Guests can also make use of the common lounge area with a TV, DVD and 2 PCs with free internet access. Some of the rooms have air conditioning and wooden floors. Towels and linen are provided free of charge.

name: Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió
description: Situated in Budapest, 2.8 km from Keleti Railway Station and 3.2 km from Puskas Ferenc Stadion, Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió features a restaurant, city views and free WiFi. Some of the units have a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The bed and breakfast offers a terrace. A car rental service is available at Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió. Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Heroes' Square is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 10 km from Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió.

name: The Magazine Hotel & Apartments
description: Located in the immediate vicinity of St Stephen’s Basilica and 250 metres from Andrássy Avenue in the busy and boisterous centre of Budapest, The Magazine Hotel & Apartments offers free WiFi access and concierge service. Each air-conditioned unit at the property comprises a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Complimentary toiletries are provided and hair dryers are available upon request at reception. Some units also feature views of the city. An À-la-carte breakfast is served at a restaurant set a 10-minute walk from the property. There are numerous restaurants, cafés and bars within a radius of 150 metres, while a grocery store is set 230 metres from The Magazine Hotel & Apartments. A beauty salon in the neighborhood provides special discounts and services for guests. The pedestrian shopping area Vörösmarty Tér and Váci Utca can be reached in 600 metres. The property is 550 metres from State Opera House and 700 metres from Chain Bridge. The transportation hub Deák Ferenc Tér with 3 metro lines and several tram and bus lines is within 350 metres from the premises. Liszt Ferenc Airport is 20 km away and the property can arrange a shuttle transfer for a surcharge.

name: Aranyeso Vendeghaz Csorbai
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Aranyeső Vendégház Csorbai is located in Budapest. Free WiFi access is available in all rooms. Free public parking is possible off site. Buffet breakfast is provided for guests. Each room at the property features cable TV, a balcony with garden and pool views and a dining table. Private bathroom comes with a shower. At Aranyeső Vendégház Csorbai guests can enjoy table tennis free of charge or relax in a garden. A snack bar and a mini-market are also available. The guest house is located a 13-minute drive away from Gellért Thermal Baths, an 11-minute drive away from Budapest Congress Centre Convention centre and 12-minute drive away from Citadella Monument. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is reachable within 23 km.

name: Corvin Center Suites
description: The Corvin Center Suites provides accommodations with kitchen facilities and air conditioning in Budapest, 500 metres from the Corvin-negyed M3 Metro Station. Free Wi-Fi access is available. The stylish apartments includes a flat-screen cable TV, a sitting area and a fully equipped kitchen. Featuring a bathtub, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The nearest grocery shops and restaurants are 50 metres from the Corvin Center Suites. The Grand Boulevard and the Danube River are a 5-minute walk from the building. Breakfast is available at the Mlinar, 30 metres from the property.

name: Thomas Hotel Budapest
description: The Thomas Hotel Budapest is conveniently located 200 metres from the Grand Boulevard of Budapest and 500 metres from the Corvin-negyed M3 Metro Stop. Free WiFi is available. The simply furnished rooms are all fitted with a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms come with shower, towels are provided. Guests can start the day with a rich breakfast buffet. The Museum of Applied Arts can be visited 500 from the hotel, while the Great Market Hall is 1 km away. The Liszt Ferenc International Airport can be reached within 25 minutes by car. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Diana Club Hotel
description: Situated in Budapest, 1.6 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, Diana Club Hotel features views of the city. The property is around 1.7 km from Keleti Railway Station, 2.6 km from Hungarian National Museum and 2.9 km from Puskas Ferenc Stadion. The hotel also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Speaking German, English, Spanish and Hungarian at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Blaha Lujza Square is 3.4 km from Diana Club Hotel, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Amber Gardenview Studios Downtown
address: Veres Palne Utca 26, Ground Floor, Budapest 1053
description: No description found

name: Intercityhotel Budapest
description: IntercityHotel Budapest is set in the centre of Budapest, 1.3 km from Puskas Arena. Providing a restaurant and a bar, the property is located within 2 km of House of Terror, Heroes' Square, Dohany Street Synagogue and Hungarian National Museum. Free WiFi is provided. The air-conditioned non-smoking rooms have a desk and private bathroom with shower. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a business centre and a meeting room on request. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 15 km from the property. The hotel is at a public transportation junction. There is a parking garage on site.

name: Vagabond Downtown
description: Situated 1.1 km from State Opera House, Vagabond Downtown provides accommodation in Budapest. The units have parquet floors and include a seating area with cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and a private bathroom. There is also an oven, microwave and a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a terrace. St. Stephen's Basilica is 1.1 km from Vagabond Downtown, while House of Terror is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 22 km from the property. Part of Vagabond Group hotel chain.

name: Vagabond Broadway
description: No description found

name: Full Moon Budapest
description: Located in the heart of Budapest and just around the corner from the banks of the Danube River, Full Moon Budapest offers air-conditioned, en suite rooms, and free WiFi access. Each private room at Full Moon is equipped with a flat-screen smart TV. Each room has an en-suite bathroom. Several supermarkets and restaurants can be found within the immediate vicinity of the Full Moon Budapest. Shops on nearby streets offer countless opportunities for shopping. The Morrisons Music Pub 2 is located inside the same building. All guests benefit from free access to this music pub. The Jászai Mari tér Tram Stop is 200 metres away, where trams stop 24 hours a day (line 4 and 6). The hotel is 450 metres from the Margaret Island, 900 metres from the Parliament, 1.3 km from the St. Stephen's Basilica and 1.5 km from the Chain Bridge. The WestEnd City Center Shopping Centre is 900 metres away.

name: Hotel Veritas
description: Hotel Veritas is located in 5-minute walk from the Puskás Ferenc Stadion metro station on M2 line. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.
