All rooms are fitted with a minibar and a safety box. The private bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries. You can start your day with a buffet breakfast at Veritas Hotel. The front desk is at your service 24 hours a day. Garage and street-front parking is available for a surcharge and airport shuttle service is also provided on request. The Papp László SportArena and the Puskás Ferenc Stadion with sport events and concerts can be reached within a 5-minute walk. The centre of Budapest is 5 km away, easily accessible by public transport. The Keleti Pályaudvar international train station is 2 metro stops from the hotel.

name: Karma Boutique Apartments
description: The Karma Boutique Apartments are ideally situated on Liszt Ferenc square with its numerous restaurants and cafés, in the centre of Budapest. The square is right on Andrassy Avenue, the prime high-street shopping area. The Opera, the theatres and the public baths are within easy walking distance. All apartments feature a kitchen and included free wireless internet access. You enjoy excellent public transport connections when staying at the Karma Boutique Apartments, as Oktogon stop of the yellow metro line is only 50 metres away.

name: Malomdulo Farmhaz
description: Surrounded by the Pilis Hills, the air-conditioned Malomdűlő Farmház is a 10-km drive from Budapest. It offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a garden with terrace and barbecue facilities. Farm animals such as goats, sheep and rabbits can be watched there. All units come with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a TV. The bright, pastel-coloured rooms have tiled floors and dark wooden beds. Continental breakfast is offered every morning. Fishing opportunities are only 200 metres away, and guests can go hiking in the surrounding hills. A bicycle track is right next to the Maloműlő. Egri Castle in Pilisborosjenő is 2 km away, while the Basilica in Esztergom is 30 km from the Farmház. Free private parking is available.

name: La Maison
description: Situated in Adyliget, 11 km from Matthias Church, La Maison features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is located 11 km from Trinity Square, 11 km from Fisherman's Bastion and 11 km from Budapest History Museum. The accommodation provides room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The motel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At La Maison rooms have bed linen and towels. An à la carte breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Buda Castle is 11 km from La Maison, while Chain Bridge is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 26 km from the motel.

name: Sun Resort Apartments
description: Sun Resort Apartments is located in the new Corvin district of Budapest and offers a self-catering accommodation, luggage storage is available. The property is set just behind the Corvin Plaza Shopping Centre and next to a pedestrian street with restaurants and bars. All units in Sun Resort Apartments come with a private entrance, a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a shower and a bath tub. Most units also have a washing machine. All the apartments are air-conditioned. It comes with an additional cost. Breakfast is served in a restaurant 30 metres from the property for an additional charge. The nearest metro station is Klinikák on line M3, reachable within 500 metres, while the Grand Boulevard with the non-stop tram line 6 is at the distance of 700 metres. The Old Downtown is located 1.7 km away, and the Gellért Thermal Bath and the Hungarian National Theater are situated 2.4 km away.

name: Czakó Bed&Breakfast
description: No description found

name: M0 Caffe & Motel
description: Set on the outskirts of Nagytartcsa, M0 Caffe & Motel houses a café, a grill-bar and a petrol station as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. The rooms feature modern furnishing, flat-screen TVs and bathrooms with shower. A breakfast can be served daily on site, while upon request guests can enjoy half-board option on à-la-carte basis from the grill specialties. M0 Caffe & Motel provides 24-hours front-desk at guests’ disposal. Budapest’s city centre can be reached within 13 km.

name: Hotel Bobbio
description: Situated in a quiet and exclusive residential area in the Buda Hills, the inviting little Bobbio hotel is a relaxing base during your stay in the impressive Hungarian capital. Take advantage of the proximity to the city centre and the lush green environment offering superb panoramic views. Tastefully renovated in 2006, the Bobbio hotel offers you nicely furnished and fully equipped rooms and apartments, where you can spend restful nights after a grand day out in Budapest. Every new day can be started with the hotel's rich buffet breakfast and the helpful and friendly staff is happy to provide you with any information you may need. The hotel's sauna is ideal for recharging your batteries after a day of sightseeing or doing business!

name: Tang house 唐舍
description: Situated in Budapest, within 9.4 km of Hungarian National Museum and 10 km of Dohany Street Synagogue, Tang house 唐舍 features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 10 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, 11 km from Blaha Lujza Square and 11 km from Keleti Railway Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 10 km from Gellért Hill. The units at the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. All rooms have a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen. Hungarian State Opera is 11 km from Tang house 唐舍, while St. Stephen's Basilica is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.
